T03D3808:26b-7: nyid la bzhugs zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni ting

T03D3808:26b-11: nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te zhes bya ba

T03D3808:26b-13: kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi

T03D3808:26b-15: ba de dang mthun par sku tha mal pa bstan
T03D3808:26b-16: to zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni seng ge rnam
T03D3808:26b-17: par rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi

T03D3808:26b-21: rab tu gtor ro zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni sprul pa'i cho 'phrul bstan to //
T03D3808:26b-22: khang pa brtsegs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
T03D3808:26b-23: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad tsam der de gnas
T03D3808:26b-24: par gyur to zhes bya ba nas bzung ste de

T03D3808:26b-28: bstan to // de nas yang zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do //
T03D3808:26b-29: zhes bya ba nas bzung ste de bzhin gshegs pa
T03D3808:26b-30: sh'akya thub pa dge slong gi dge bdun dang bcas
T03D3808:26b-31: pa / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs cig

T03D3808:26b-40: bya ba'i bar gyis ni 'khor sdud pa'i cho 'phrul

T03D3808:27a-2: de yang rnam pa bzhis bstan te /

T03D3808:27a-4: spu'i khung bu nas 'od zer rnam par bkye ba dang /
T03D3808:27a-5: rang bzhin gyi 'od zer rnam par bkye ba dang /
T03D3808:27a-6: ljags kyi dbang po las 'od zer rnam par bkye bas so //
T03D3808:27a-7: ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting
T03D3808:27a-8: nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so zhes bya ba
T03D3808:27a-9: la de bzhin gshegs pa ci'i phyir mnyam par 'jog
T03D3808:27a-10: / ci mnyam par ma bzhag par sgrub /
T03D3808:27a-11: mi spyod dam zhe na mi spyod pa ni ma yin gyi /
T03D3808:27a-12: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni g-yeng bar
T03D3808:27a-13: spyod pa la dgyes pa ma yin la mdzes pa
T03D3808:27a-15: rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa'i phyir /
T03D3808:27a-16: 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag pa

T03D3808:27a-21: de'i phyir 'di skad du ting nge 'dzin gang du
T03D3808:27a-22: ting nge 'dzin thams cad chud pa dang zhes bya

T03D3808:27a-30: // bya bas ni yang dag par gzhol bar 'gyur ro //

T03D3808:27a-32: nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i mdo las
T03D3808:27a-33: rig par bya'o // de bas na ting nge 'dzin
T03D3808:27a-34: gyi rgyal po zhes bya bar nges pa'i tshig gis

T03D3808:27a-37: mtshan nyid ji lta bu zhe na /

T03D3808:27b-4: pa med pas bsam gtan bzhi pa zhes bya ba'i
T03D3808:27b-6: ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po ni g-yo ba med

T03D3808:27b-8: ba med pa zhes bya bar brjod do //
T03D3808:27b-9: ting nge 'dzin de ni gzugs na spyod pa ma yin /
T03D3808:27b-10: 'dod pa na spyod pa yang ma yin /
T03D3808:27b-11: gzugs med pa na spyod pa yang ma yin gyi /
T03D3808:27b-12: de ni zag pa med pa btang snyoms dang ldan pa /
T03D3808:27b-13: sems rtse gcig tu gyur pa la ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
T03D3808:27b-14: de yang bya ba'i bye brag nyid kyis dpa' bar 'gro ba dang /
T03D3808:27b-15: seng ge rnam par rol pa dang /
T03D3808:27b-16: ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po dang /
T03D3808:27b-17: chos thams cad las 'phags pa dang /
T03D3808:27b-18: spyi gtsug bltar mi snang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i ming du brjod du zad kyi /
T03D3808:27b-19: rang bzhin tha dad par dbye ba ni med do //
T03D3808:27b-20: de ltar ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag pa

T03D3808:27b-24: 'dzum pa zhes bya ba ni 'dir kha 'bye ba la bya ste /

T03D3808:27b-26: 'byung du rung bar mdzad nas rgyas par mdzad ces

T03D3808:27b-30: mod kyi / dgos pa zhig yod na ting nge
T03D3808:27b-31: 'dzin gyi mthu las de lta de lta bu mngon
T03D3808:27b-32: mod kyi / par 'grub ste / ting nge 'dzin

T03D3808:28b-11: do snyam du brtsal ma thag tu 'od zer rnams
T03D3808:28b-12: 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes mdo las bshad do //

T03D3808:28b-33: snod kyi 'jig rten byi dor bya ba ni bshad pa la mchod pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3808:28b-34: byi dor bya ba de la yang rnam pa lngas bstan te /

T03D3808:29a-20: mthon por gyur cing dbus kyi so na gnas pa

T03D3808:29a-29: ri chen po la sogs pa ni 'jam par gyur to //

T03D3808:29b-8: sangs rgyas med pa'i bskal pa la skyes pa rnams so //

T03D3808:33b-0: te chos 'chad do @33b snyam du sems so zhes
T03D3808:33b-1: gong du smos pa gang yin pa de dang yang
T03D3808:33b-2: 'gal lo // der 'dus pa thams cad bdag gcig pu'i ngor gzigs nas /
T03D3808:33b-3: de bzhin gshegs pas chos bshad do snyam du yang
T03D3808:33b-4: sems na gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag
T03D3808:33b-5: thams cad kyi nang nas dmigs kyis gcig la bka'
T03D3808:33b-7: de'i tshe 'khor gyi sems dang 'gal bar ji ltar mi 'gyur zhe na /
T03D3808:33b-9: de bzhin gshegs pas ni thams cad las brtsams nas
T03D3808:33b-10: thams cad mngon du mdzad de bshad mod kyi 'on
T03D3808:33b-11: kyang sh'a ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa'i skad cig
T03D3808:33b-12: la thams cad la yang bka' stsal par 'gyur te
T03D3808:33b-13: / bshad pa'i skad cig de la thams cad la
T03D3808:33b-14: yang bshad pa tha dad pa rnam pa sna tshogs
T03D3808:33b-15: / mdzad na / yang dag par sdud par byed
T03D3808:33b-16: pa rnams kyis rim pa de yang dag par sdud
T03D3808:33b-17: mi nus pa'i phyir bshad pa'i ye shes kyi mdzes
T03D3808:33b-18: / mdzad na / brjid bzhag ste / skye bo
T03D3808:33b-19: thams cad la 'os pa'i rim pa gcig bzung nas
T03D3808:33b-21: yang na de bzhin gshegs pas ni sh'a ri'i bu
T03D3808:33b-22: nyid las brtsams nas bstan pas tshul 'di nyid dam
T03D3808:33b-23: pa'i chos yun ring du gnas pa'i rgyu yin pa'i
T03D3808:33b-24: phyir de bzhin gshegs pas kyang rjes su gnang ngo
T03D3808:33b-25: // de bas na yang dag par sdud par byed
T03D3808:33b-26: pa rnams kyis kyang 'di nyid la brten nas yang
T03D3808:33b-28: de lta yin du zin kyang byang chub sems dpa'i
T03D3808:33b-29: theg pa bshad pa mchog bstan pa la ci'i phyir
T03D3808:33b-30: byang chub sems dpa' rnams yongs su bzhag ste sh'a
T03D3808:33b-31: ri'i bu nyid la bka' stsal cing skabs phye zhe
T03D3808:33b-32: na / de ni 'di ltar gzung bar bya ste /
T03D3808:33b-33: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bshad pa ni spyir bshad pa yin gyi /
T03D3808:33b-34: byang chub sems dpa' rnams nyid kyi don du bshad pa ni ma yin no //
T03D3808:33b-36: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni thams cad shes pa nyid dang /
T03D3808:33b-37: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /
T03D3808:33b-38: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /
T03D3808:33b-39: sgo gsum du bzhugs pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3808:33b-40: de la gal te byang chub sems dpa' gang yang
T03D3808:33b-41: rung ba cig la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
T03D3808:34a-1: zin na 'khor gzhan dag zab mo 'di ni bdag
T03D3808:34a-2: cag gi spyod yul ma yin no snyam nas 'bad
T03D3808:34a-3: par mi byed kyang srid kyi /
T03D3808:34a-4: sh'a ri'i bu las brtsams te skabs phye na ni
T03D3808:34a-5: bshad pa 'di skye bo thams cad dang thun mong
T03D3808:34a-6: yin te / shin tu zab pa ma yin no snyam du gzhan dag sems par 'gyur ro //
T03D3808:34a-7: de bas na sh'a ri'i bu nyid las brtsams te skabs phye'o //
T03D3808:34a-8: 'di ltar 'og nas kyang dge slong rnams dang /
T03D3808:34a-9: 'khor gzhan dag gis kyang chos mngon par rtogs nas so sor thob po zhes 'byung ngo //
T03D3808:34a-10: de la de lta yin du zin kyang gnas brtan
T03D3808:34a-11: sh'a ri'i bu ni bya ba byas pa yin pas
T03D3808:34a-12: bshad pa don chen po 'di las brtsams te skabs
T03D3808:34a-13: dbye ba mi rigs so zhe na yang de ltar
T03D3808:34a-14: gnas brtan sh'a ri'i bu bya ba byas pa yin
T03D3808:34a-15: no zhes zer ba de la bcom ldan 'das kyis
T03D3808:34a-16: dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po las /
T03D3808:34a-17: sh'a ri'i bu khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med /
T03D3808:34a-19: tshad med pa rnams su de bzhin gshegs pa bye
T03D3808:34a-20: ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po rnams kyi dam
T03D3808:34a-21: pa'i chos bzung nas mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs
T03D3808:34a-22: kyang byas te / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di nyid yongs su rdzogs par byas nas /
T03D3808:34a-23: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul dang bral ba zhes bya
T03D3808:34a-24: ba'i 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
T03D3808:34a-25: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma'i
T03D3808:34a-26: 'od ces bya bar 'gyur zhing 'jig rten du 'byung
T03D3808:34a-27: ngo zhes gnas brtan sh'a ri'i bu sangs rgyas su
T03D3808:34a-29: ji ltar na dge slong zag pa zad pa las
T03D3808:34a-30: dang nyon mongs pa'i rgyun chad pa yang srid par
T03D3808:34a-31: nying mtshams sbyor zhing bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab
T03D3808:34a-32: / dpag tu med par byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod par 'gyur te /
T03D3808:34a-33: 'di nyid kyang shes par mi rung ngo //
T03D3808:34a-34: gal te dgra bcom pa rnams kyang yang srid par
T03D3808:34a-35: nying mtshams sbyor du zin na ni dgra bcom pa
T03D3808:34a-36: thams cad kyang yang srid pa so sor len par
T03D3808:34a-37: 'gyur bas thar pa mi 'grub pa nyid du 'gyur
T03D3808:34a-38: ro zhe na / yang 'di ni nges pa med de /
T03D3808:34a-39: gal te dgra bcom pa rnams la las dang /
T03D3808:34b-0: nyon mongs pa yod du zin @34b na ni las
T03D3808:34b-1: dang nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis srid par skye bar
T03D3808:34b-2: yang 'gyur te / thar pa mi 'grub po zhes bya ba smra ba de ni rigs na /
T03D3808:34b-3: ngo bo nyi dgra bcom pa rnams la las dang nyon mongs pa yod cing /
T03D3808:34b-4: des byas pa'i srid par skye bar 'gyur ro zhes ni mi smra'o //
T03D3808:34b-5: mdo gzhan las 'byung ba'i rim pas don rgya cher bstan par bya'o //
T03D3808:34b-6: 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas sems can kha cig ni nges pa'i rigs can /
T03D3808:34b-7: kha cig ni ma nges pa'i rigs can yin par yang dag par gzigs so //
T03D3808:34b-8: de la nges pa'i rigs can gang yin pa de
T03D3808:34b-9: dag ni rigs kyi bye brag nyid kyis de 'grub
T03D3808:34b-10: par brjod kyang mi dgos kyi /
T03D3808:34b-11: sems can ma nges pa'i rigs can gang yin pa
T03D3808:34b-12: de dag rkyen rnyed na rkyen ji lta ba bzhin
T03D3808:34b-13: du byang chub gsum gyi skal ba yod par de
T03D3808:34b-14: bzhin gshegs pas gzigs nas de dag rim gyis sangs
T03D3808:34b-15: rgyas su bsgral bar bzhed na /
T03D3808:34b-16: de dag nyon mongs pa che ba dang /
T03D3808:34b-17: dbang po brtul bas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa
T03D3808:34b-18: bzang po spyod pa'i mthu dang mi ldan par gzigs
T03D3808:34b-19: nas de'i phyir sems can de dag dang por nyon
T03D3808:34b-20: mongs pa nye bar zhi ba'i rgyur gyur pa'i lam
T03D3808:34b-23: mya ngan las 'das pa gnyis tha mi dad pa'i
T03D3808:34b-24: phyir de bzhin nyid mya ngan las 'das pa mngon
T03D3808:34b-25: sum du bya ba la 'dzud pa mdzad do //
T03D3808:34b-26: de dag de ltar btsud nas kyang tshul khrims dang /
T03D3808:34b-27: ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab la bslabs nas rim
T03D3808:34b-28: gyis de bzhin nyid mya ngan las 'das pa mngon
T03D3808:34b-30: de ni mthong ba'i sa zhes kyang bya ba la /
T03D3808:34b-31: rgyun tu zhugs pa'i lam zhes bya bar yang shes so //
T03D3808:34b-32: de nas yang 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang /
T03D3808:34b-33: gnod sems gnyis spong ba la 'dzud pa mdzad de /
T03D3808:34b-34: 'phags pa de dag gis 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang /
T03D3808:34b-35: gnod sems bsrabs pas de bzhin nyid rtogs par 'gyur te /
T03D3808:34b-36: de ni bsrabs pa'i sa zhes kyang bya la /
T03D3808:34b-37: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i lam zhes bya bar yang shes so //
T03D3808:34b-38: de nas de nyid ma lus par spang ba la
T03D3808:34b-39: btsud pas de bzhin nyid rtogs nas 'dod chags dang
T03D3808:35a-1: gsum pa sgrub par byed do /
T03D3808:35a-2: de nyid la phyir mi 'ong d'i lam zhes kyang brjod do //
T03D3808:35a-3: de nas yang gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang /
T03D3808:35a-7: ma rig pa lhag ma rnams spangs pa la btsud
T03D3808:35a-8: nas de bzhin nyid rtogs pa de nyid kyis byas
T03D3808:35a-9: pa bsrung ba'i sa rtogs par 'gyur te /
T03D3808:35a-10: de nyid la dgra bcom pa'i lam zhes kyang brjod do //
T03D3808:35a-11: thams cad la yang de dag btsud nas ci nas
T03D3808:35a-12: kyang sangs rgyas nyid la 'dod pa chen po skye
T03D3808:35a-13: bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar chos ston to
T03D3808:35a-14: // de nas sangs rgyas nyid 'dod pa de dag
T03D3808:35a-15: sangs rgyas nyid 'dod pas byas pa srung ba can
T03D3808:35a-16: gyi sa la nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs par
T03D3808:35a-17: gyur pa na ma rig pa'i bag chags ni ma
T03D3808:35a-18: // spangs te / de ma spangs pas nyon mongs pa'i bag chags thams cad kyang ma spangs so //
T03D3808:35a-19: de nas de dag la de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa bshad pa mdzad do //
T03D3808:35a-20: bshad pa des kyang dbang po shin tu sbyangs nas
T03D3808:35a-21: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par
T03D3808:35a-22: byed nus pa'i bsam pa can du 'gyur te /
T03D3808:35a-23: rim gyis zab mo'i chos la bzod pa yang thob par 'gyur ro //
T03D3808:35a-24: de ltar sangs rgyas kyi sa la bsam pa nges pa nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa /
T03D3808:35a-25: chos kyi dbyings shin tu rtogs pa chos zab mo
T03D3808:35a-26: la bzod pa thob pa la de bzhin gshegs pas
T03D3808:35a-27: sangs rgyas su lung bstan te /
T03D3808:35a-28: de'i tshe nas brgyad pa gnas pa rnam par mi
T03D3808:35a-29: rtog pa lhun gyis grub pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
T03D3808:35a-31: de dag de ltar gyur pa dang yang srid pa
T03D3808:35a-32: gzhan len pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod
T03D3808:35a-33: cing sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang
T03D3808:35a-34: / bdag nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su smin par byed do //
T03D3808:35a-35: yang srid pa ji ltar len ce na /
T03D3808:35a-39: de la nyon mongs pa'i bag chags ma spangs pa
T03D3808:35a-40: gang yin pa de ni yang srid par nying mtshams
T03D3808:35b-0: zag pa dang bcas pa'i dge @35b ba'i rtsa ba'i
T03D3808:35b-1: rgyu las byung ba zag pa med pa'i dge ba'i
T03D3808:35b-2: rtsa ba de dag ni yang srid pa byed pa'i
T03D3808:35b-3: rgyu'o // de dag ni mdo las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya ste /
T03D3808:35b-4: blo gros rgya mtsho 'khor ba'i rgyun byed pa dge
T03D3808:35b-5: ba'i rtsa ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i nyon mongs
T03D3808:35b-6: pa de dag gang zhe na /
T03D3808:35b-7: 'di lta ste bsod nams kyi tshogs btsal bas yongs su mi ngoms pa dang /
T03D3808:35b-8: bsams bzhin du srid par skye ba yongs su 'dzin pa dang /
T03D3808:35b-9: sangs rgyas dang phrad par smon pa dang /
T03D3808:35b-10: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la yongs su mi skyo ba dang /
T03D3808:35b-11: dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa la brtson pa dang /
T03D3808:35b-12: sems can gyi bya ba ci yod snyam pa la spro ba dang /
T03D3808:35b-13: chos 'dod pa'i bag la nyal mi 'dor ba dang /
T03D3808:35b-14: pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor ba rnams yongs su mi gtong ba ste /
T03D3808:35b-15: blo gros rgya mtsho de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa
T03D3808:35b-16: ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams
T03D3808:35b-17: so // byang chub sems dpa' ni de dag gis
T03D3808:35b-18: nyon mongs kyang nyon mongs pa'i skyon rnams kyis mi
T03D3808:35b-20: bcom ldan 'das de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba lags na /
T03D3808:35b-21: ci'i slad du nyon mongs pa rnams zhes bgyi /
T03D3808:35b-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T03D3808:35b-23: blo gros rgya mtsho 'di ltar nyon mongs pa de
T03D3808:35b-24: lta bu de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams
T03D3808:35b-25: khams gsum na nyon mongs la khams gsum pa ni
T03D3808:35b-26: nyon mongs pa las byung ba yin pas so //
T03D3808:35b-27: de la byang chub sems dpa' ni thabs mkhas pa
T03D3808:35b-28: dang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs bskyed pas bsams bzhin
T03D3808:35b-29: du khams gsum na nyon mongs so //
T03D3808:35b-30: de'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i nyon mongs pa zhes bya ste /
T03D3808:35b-31: khams gsum na nyon mongs pas de skad bya'i sems nye bar nyon mongs pas ni ma yin no //
T03D3808:35b-32: blo gros rgya mtsho 'di lta ste dper na tshong
T03D3808:35b-33: dpon khyim bdag cig la bu sdug pa phangs pa
T03D3808:35b-35: lta ba dang mthun pa gcig pu zhig yod par
T03D3808:35b-36: gyur pa khye'u de yang byis par gyur pas gar
T03D3808:35b-37: byed pa las phyi sa khung btsog pa zhig tu
T03D3808:35b-38: lhung ba dang / de nas khye'u de'i ma dang
T03D3808:35b-39: mdza' bshes dang nye du dag gis khye'u de phyi
T03D3808:36a-0: lhung ba dang / @36a * // sa khung btsog par lhung bar mthong ngo //
T03D3808:36a-1: mthong nas kyang shugs phab ste mya ngan byed cing
T03D3808:36a-2: smre sngags 'don gyis phyi sa khung btsog pa der
T03D3808:36a-3: zhugs te bu gcig pa de mi 'byin to //
T03D3808:36a-4: de nas khye'u de'i pha 'ongs te /
T03D3808:36a-5: des bu gcig pa phyi sa khung btsog par lhung ba de mthong la /
T03D3808:36a-6: mthong nas kyang bu gcig pa la bsam pa thag
T03D3808:36a-7: pa nas byams shing rjes su chags pas mi smod
T03D3808:36a-8: par myur du skyen par la gor du phyi sa
T03D3808:36a-9: khung btsog pa der zhugs te /
T03D3808:36a-10: bu gcig pa phyung ba 'di lta bu 'di ni
T03D3808:36a-11: blo gros rgya mtsho ji tsam du don shes par
T03D3808:36a-12: bya ba'i phyir dper byas pa yin no //
T03D3808:36a-13: 'dir don du lta ba gang zhe na /
T03D3808:36a-14: blo gros rgya mtsho phyis khung btsog pa zhes bya
T03D3808:36a-15: ba de ni khams gsum gyi tshig bla dags so
T03D3808:36a-16: // bu gcig pa zhes bya ba de ni sems can thams cad kyi tshig bla dags te /
T03D3808:36a-17: de dag la byang chub sems dpa' bu gcig pa ltar 'du shes so //
T03D3808:36a-18: ma dang mdza' bshes dang nye du zhes bya ba
T03D3808:36a-19: de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg
T03D3808:36a-20: pa pa'i gang zag rnams kyi tshig bla dags te
T03D3808:36a-21: / de dag ni 'khor bar lhung ba'i sems can
T03D3808:36a-22: rnams mthong na mya ngan byed cing smre sngags 'don
T03D3808:36a-25: dpon khyim bdag ces bya ba 'di ni byang chub
T03D3808:36a-26: sems dpa'i tshig bla dags so zhes bya ba la
T03D3808:36a-27: sogs pa gsungs pa lta bu ste /
T03D3808:36a-28: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par smin pa'i bdag nyid
T03D3808:36a-29: du yongs su bsgyur ba de dag ma rig pa'i
T03D3808:36a-30: bag chags kyi rkyen gyi dbang gis rgyas par gyur
T03D3808:36a-33: bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na /
T03D3808:36a-34: nye bar len pa'i rkyen dang /
T03D3808:36a-35: zag pa dang bcas pa'i las kyi rgyu las srid pa gsum 'byung bar 'gyur te /
T03D3808:36a-36: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du ma rig pa'i bag chags kyi sa'i rkyen dang /
T03D3808:36a-37: zag pa ma mchis pa'i las kyi rgyu las dgra bcom pa rnams dang /
T03D3808:36a-39: dbang thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yid
T03D3808:36a-40: 'byung ba'i lus gsum du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa
T03D3808:36a-41: lta bu'o // da ni brjod par bya ste /
T03D3808:36b-0: ci lus de @36b 'jig rten 'di par bgrang ngam /
T03D3808:36b-1: 'on te 'jig rten pha rol par bgrang /
T03D3808:36b-4: gzugs med pa'i khams su bgrang zhe na /
T03D3808:36b-9: 'jig rten gang du 'ang mi bgrang ngo //
T03D3808:36b-10: 'o na lus mngon par grub pa de ji 'dra ba zhig ce na /
T03D3808:36b-12: yid las byung ba'i sprul pa lta bur lta'i sprul pa nyid ni ma yin no //
T03D3808:36b-13: yang srid pa zhes bya ba ni 'chi 'pho dang skye ba'i dbang gis btags par brjod pa ste /
T03D3808:36b-14: dbang thob pa rnams ni sems can gyi don du 'gyur ba yod na /
T03D3808:36b-15: skye gnas dang 'gro ba de dang de dag tu snang bar 'gyur la /
T03D3808:36b-16: sems can gyi don du 'gyur ba med na ni bdag nyid mi snang bar 'gyur te /
T03D3808:36b-17: 'chi 'pho dang skye ba yang de nyid yin la /
T03D3808:36b-18: lus de nyid zag pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa
T03D3808:36b-19: ba'i rnam par smin pa yin pa'i phyir 'dus byas
T03D3808:36b-20: yin te / 'khor ba zhes kyang bya'o //
T03D3808:36b-21: zag pa dang bcas pa'i las dang /
T03D3808:36b-22: nyon mongs pas mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'i phyir /
T03D3808:36b-23: 'dus ma byas pa zhes kyang bya ste /
T03D3808:36b-24: de nyid la mya ngan las 'das pa zhes kyang bya'o //
T03D3808:36b-25: 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du 'dus byas
T03D3808:36b-26: dang 'dus ma byas pa'i 'khor ba yang mchis la
T03D3808:36b-27: / 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas pa'i mya ngan
T03D3808:36b-28: las 'das pa yang mchis so zhes 'byung ba lta
T03D3808:36b-29: / bu ste / de ltar na de bzhin gshegs
T03D3808:36b-30: pa thabs la mkhas pas nyan thos 'di dag sngar
T03D3808:36b-31: dgra bcom par mdzad pas nyon mongs pa spangs nas
T03D3808:36b-32: de'i 'og tu byang chub kyi lam la sbyor bar
T03D3808:36b-33: / bu ste / mdzad de / 'di ni de
T03D3808:36b-34: bzhin gshegs pa don dam pa'i chos kyi dbang phyug
T03D3808:36b-35: rnams kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i thabs so //
T03D3808:36b-36: ji skad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas
T03D3808:36b-37: nyan thos rnams bla na med pa yang dag par
T03D3808:36b-38: rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa de dag
T03D3808:36b-40: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

T03D3808:43b-27: sbyor ba thams cad la don dam par btsal na
T03D3808:43b-28: mngon sum du mthong bas de bzhin nyid du gnas
T03D3808:43b-29: par 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no //
T03D3808:43b-30: de bzhin nyid de yang sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe
T03D3808:43b-31: ni sus kyang sbyin pa'am blang bar mi nus te
T03D3808:43b-32: / de bas na don dam par yongs su gtong ba zhes bya ba gang yang med do //
T03D3808:43b-33: bza' ba dang btung ba dang mal cha la sogs
T03D3808:43b-34: pa yongs su gtong ba gang yin pa de dag
T03D3808:43b-35: ni kun brtag pa'i chos la gnas pa'i phyir rmi
T03D3808:43b-36: lam dang sgyu ma bzhin du yod pa ma yin
T03D3808:43b-37: no // de ltar don dam par yongs su gtong
T03D3808:43b-38: ba'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba nyid la yongs su
T03D3808:43b-39: gtong ba med pa'i tshul zhes bya'o //
T03D3808:44a-1: su gtong ba med pa'i tshul des dngos po la sbyin par bya ba dang /
T03D3808:44a-2: bdag la gtong ba po dang /
T03D3808:44a-3: slong ba la len par byed pa dang gsum mi dmigs te /
T03D3808:44a-4: dmigs pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba nyid do //
T03D3808:44a-5: phyir zhes bya ba ni brten cing bzung nas sbyin
T03D3808:44a-6: pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par
T03D3808:44a-7: bya ba'o // dang por ni snying rje'i stobs kyis
T03D3808:44a-8: kun rdzob kyi tshul la gnas te 'jig rten pa'i
T03D3808:44a-9: spyod pa'i dbang gis sbyin pa byed do //
T03D3808:44a-10: de nas shes rab kyi dbang gis don dam pa'i
T03D3808:44a-11: tshul la gnas te 'jig rten las 'das pa'i spyod
T03D3808:44a-12: pa'i dbang gis thams cad kyang shes rab kyis yongs
T03D3808:44a-13: su btsal na dmigs su med par gyur pa de'i
T03D3808:44a-14: tshe / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
T03D3808:44a-15: su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i ming du 'gyur ro
T03D3808:44a-16: tshe / // de bas na dang po sems bskyed pa'i dmigs par gyur pa sems can dang /
T03D3808:44a-17: byang chub gnyis yongs su ma btang bar gyur te /
T03D3808:44a-18: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i ming yang dag pa'i don dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
T03D3808:44a-19: de ltar na sbyin par bya ba dang /
T03D3808:44a-21: len pa po rnams mi dmigs pa dang /
T03D3808:44a-22: sbyin pa dag shin tu 'gal ba yin na ji
T03D3808:44a-23: ltar na 'gal ba med pa lta bur 'gyur zhe
T03D3808:44a-24: na / thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs kyis 'gyur te /
T03D3808:44a-25: thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni kun rdzob 'dzin pa'i snying rje dang /
T03D3808:44a-26: don dam pa 'dzin pa'i shes rab gnyis kyis skam la rgyu ba dang /
T03D3808:44a-27: chu na rgyu ba'i srog chags kyi sbyor ba bzhin
T03D3808:44a-28: du sbyor ba'i khyad par shin tu 'gal ba yin
T03D3808:44a-29: du zin kyang sbyor ba'i rnam pas 'gal ba med
T03D3808:44a-30: par grogs byas nas cig car sgrub cing 'jug ste
T03D3808:44a-31: / byang chub kyi bar du bsod nams kyi tshogs dang /
T03D3808:44a-32: ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad sgrub pa ni byang
T03D3808:44a-33: chub dang sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa'i mchog
T03D3808:44a-35: 'og nas kyang skabs ji lta ba de bzhin du de dag 'chad do //
T03D3808:44a-37: lhag par ltung ba mi 'byung ba'i phyir tshul khrims
T03D3808:44a-38: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par
T03D3808:44a-39: bya'o zhes bya ba la byang chub sems dpa' khyim
T03D3808:44b-0: pa ni byang @44b chub sems dpa'i sdom pa'i bslab
T03D3808:44b-1: pa yang dag par blangs te gnas /
T03D3808:44b-2: rab tu byung ba ni sdom pa'i bslab pa gnyis
T03D3808:44b-3: ka yang dag par blangs te gnas pa na ltung
T03D3808:44b-5: gal te ltung ba byung na yang dus las yol
T03D3808:44b-6: bar lhag par ltung ba mi 'byung gi myur zhing
T03D3808:44b-7: myur du mthol bar byed de /
T03D3808:44b-8: de bas na ltung ba mi 'byung ba dang /
T03D3808:44b-9: lhag par ltung ba mi 'byung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T03D3808:44b-10: 'dir yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te zhes bya bar snyegs te /
T03D3808:44b-11: bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o //
T03D3808:44b-13: 'di ni 'chal ba'i tshul khrims so zhes bya ba'i
T03D3808:44b-14: rnam par rtog pa gsum mi dmigs pas 'khor gsum
T03D3808:44b-15: yongs su dag par rig par bya ste /
T03D3808:44b-16: 'di ltar 'og nas kyang bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o //
T03D3808:44b-18: 'di ni 'chal ba'i tshul khrims so zhes bya bas rlom sems su mi byed do zhes 'byung ngo //
T03D3808:44b-19: 'khrug pa med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni bzod
T03D3808:44b-20: pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid bstan
T03D3808:44b-21: te / de yang snying rje'i dbang gis sems can la 'khrug pa med pa dang /
T03D3808:44b-22: shes rab kyi dbang gis 'du byed rnams la bdag med par rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3808:44b-25: gnod sems rnams mi dmigs pas 'khor gsum yongs su
T03D3808:44b-26: dag pa ni 'og nas skabs ji lta ba nyid
T03D3808:44b-27: du 'chad do // lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus
T03D3808:44b-28: nyams pa med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba 'dis ni
T03D3808:44b-29: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'jug
T03D3808:44b-30: du 'chad do // pa bstan te / rgyun du
T03D3808:44b-31: chud pa dang gus pa dang nan tan du lus
T03D3808:44b-32: dang sems kyi brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed par
T03D3808:44b-33: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
T03D3808:44b-34: rdzogs par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T03D3808:44b-35: ma btang ba de yang shes rab dang /
T03D3808:44b-36: snying rje nyid kyi 'gyur ba nyid do //
T03D3808:44b-37: 'dir yang brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang /
T03D3808:44b-38: brtson 'grus dang le lo rnams mi dmigs pas pha rol tu phyin pa nyid du 'grub po //
T03D3808:44b-39: ro myang ba med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni
T03D3808:44b-40: gal te bdag gi don du bsam gtan la 'jug
T03D3808:45a-1: gtan gyi ro myong bar byed par 'gyur na 'di
T03D3808:45a-2: ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag gi don
T03D3808:45a-3: 'ba' zhig la sbyor ba thams cad la sdig pa
T03D3808:45a-4: bzhin du rnam par smod par byed na /
T03D3808:45a-5: de la bsam gtan gyi ro myang ba'i yid la byed pa lta ga la yod /
T03D3808:45a-6: de bas na nyon mongs pa can dang /
T03D3808:45a-7: dag pa dang zag pa med pa'i bsam gtan gsum las dag pa dang /
T03D3808:45a-8: zag pa med pa nyid la snyoms par 'jug gi
T03D3808:45a-9: nyon mongs pa can la mi 'jug go zhes bya
T03D3808:45a-11: 'dir yang ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa dang /
T03D3808:45a-12: ting nge 'dzin dang g-yeng pa rnams mi dmigs pas
T03D3808:45a-13: pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur
T03D3808:45a-14: ro // chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i phyir zhes
T03D3808:45a-15: bya ba ni gang gi phyir de bzhin nyid tsam
T03D3808:45a-16: du mthong bas ni 'jig rten pa'i kun brtags pa'i
T03D3808:45a-17: chos thams cad mi dmigs la /
T03D3808:45a-18: 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams la yang rnam par mi rtog ste /
T03D3808:45a-19: de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3808:45a-20: pa yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro
T03D3808:45a-21: // ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3808:45a-22: phyin pa la gnas te shes rab kyi pha rol
T03D3808:45a-23: tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na
T03D3808:45a-24: // / gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol
T03D3808:45a-25: tu phyin pa zhes bya ba rnam pa thams cad
T03D3808:45a-27: theg pa chen po la bya ba de'i tshe na ni klan kar 'gyur ba med do //
T03D3808:45a-28: gang gi tshe rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes rab
T03D3808:45a-29: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bya bar gyur
T03D3808:45a-30: pa de'i tshe yang don dam pa shes rab kyi
T03D3808:45a-31: pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos gang yang med do
T03D3808:45a-32: snyam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3808:45a-33: rnam par rtog pa med pa'i bdag nyid rnam par
T03D3808:45a-34: mi rtog pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3808:45a-35: pa la gnas pa yin te /
T03D3808:45a-36: de'i tshe ni khams gsum pa la sogs pa de
T03D3808:45a-37: bzhin nyid tsam du zad do snyam du kun rdzob
T03D3808:45a-38: kyi rnam par skyes pa'i shes rab sbyor ba'i lam
T03D3808:45a-39: du rtogs pa ni rnam par rtog pa'i bdag nyid
T03D3808:45a-40: yin yang rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes rab kyis
T03D3808:45a-41: yongs su zin pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol
T03D3808:45a-42: tu phyin pa zhes bya bar 'gyur te /
T03D3808:45a-43: de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3808:45a-44: pa la gnas te shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3808:45a-45: phyin pa bsgom par dgongs pas klan kar 'gyur ba
T03D3808:45b-0: med do // 'dir @45b yang shes rab can dang /
T03D3808:45b-2: 'chal ba'i shes rab rnams mi dmigs pas 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa yin par rig par bya'o //
T03D3808:45b-3: de'i 'og tu sh'a ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha
T03D3808:45b-4: rol tu phyin pa la gnas te dran pa nye
T03D3808:45b-5: bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes
T03D3808:45b-6: bya ba la sogs pas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
T03D3808:45b-8: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams bsgom pa ni
T03D3808:45b-9: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa
T03D3808:45b-10: mya ngan las 'das pa la gzhol bar byed pa
T03D3808:45b-12: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mi rigs so zhe na yang 'di la nyes pa med de /
T03D3808:45b-13: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du rtogs par bzhed pa dang /
T03D3808:45b-14: chos thams cad mi dmigs par lhur len pas ci
T03D3808:45b-15: byang chub kyi chos rnams don dam par yod dam
T03D3808:45b-16: / 'on te med ces de dag la yongs su tshol bas rigs so //
T03D3808:45b-17: 'o na de ltar gyur na byang chub kyi phyogs
T03D3808:45b-18: kyi chos rnams bsgoms pa'i rgyur mya ngan las 'das
T03D3808:45b-19: pa mngon sum du mdzad par 'gyur te /
T03D3808:45b-21: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rgyun du zhugs pa
T03D3808:45b-22: nas dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du thob par
T03D3808:45b-24: yang sngon gyi rtsol ba'i shugs kyi mthu nyid kyis de 'grub par 'di la nyes pa med de /
T03D3808:45b-25: yang gang dag 'khor ba la nyes dmigs su mthong nas yid byung ba dang /
T03D3808:45b-26: mya ngan las 'das pa la yon tan du mthong
T03D3808:45b-27: nas de nyid don du gnyer cing sgrub pa de
T03D3808:45b-28: dag ni sngon gyi rtsol ba'i shugs kyis dran pa
T03D3808:45b-29: nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsgoms ba'i rgyus 'bad mi
T03D3808:45b-30: dgos bar mya ngan las 'das pa mngon sum du
T03D3808:45b-32: byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'khor ba dang mya
T03D3808:45b-33: ngan las 'das pa la sems mnyam pa sems can
T03D3808:45b-34: thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba bskyed pa
T03D3808:45b-35: lhur len pa dag ni sems can la phan pa'i
T03D3808:45b-36: rgyu yin pa'i phyir 'khor ba la yang mya ngan
T03D3808:45b-37: las 'das pa bzhin du yon tan du gzigs la
T03D3808:45b-38: sems ca la phan 'dogs pa'i gnas pa ma yin
T03D3808:45b-39: pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa la yang 'khor
T03D3808:46a-0: ba bzhin du mi mthun par gzigs pa dang @46a
T03D3808:46a-1: * // chos nyid tsam du zad pa'i phyir de
T03D3808:46a-2: gnyi ga yang mnyam pa nyid du gzigs pas dmigs
T03D3808:46a-3: su med pa'i ngo bo nyid du so sor rtog
T03D3808:46a-4: pa'i phyir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams bsgoms
T03D3808:46a-5: * // te / de dag ni byang chub kyi
T03D3808:46a-6: phyogs kyi chos rnams mngon sum du mdzad pa kho
T03D3808:46a-7: na tsam du zad kyi rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
T03D3808:46a-9: mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon sum du mdzad pa'i phyir nye bar mdzad pa ma yin te /
T03D3808:46a-10: de nyid la yongs su 'dris pa'i shes pa zhes bya'o //
T03D3808:46a-11: 'di ltar 'og nas kyang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
T03D3808:46a-12: chos rnams la gnas nas 'di ni yongs su 'dris
T03D3808:46a-13: par bya ba'i dus yin gyi mngon sum du bya
T03D3808:46a-14: ba'i dus ni ma yin par shes so zhes bya
T03D3808:46a-15: ba la sogs pa yongs su 'dris pa'i shes pa
T03D3808:46a-17: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi zhes bya ba ni de la lus dang /
T03D3808:46a-20: rnam pa bzhi rnams la rjes su lta ba rnam
T03D3808:46a-21: pa bzhi la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi
T03D3808:46a-22: zhes bya ste / sngar yongs su shes par mdzad
T03D3808:46a-23: nas de'i 'og tu yang dag pa ji lta ba
T03D3808:46a-24: bzhin du yongs su tshol ba na /
T03D3808:46a-28: de dag la dmigs pa'i dran pa dang /
T03D3808:46a-30: de dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems las byung ba'i
T03D3808:46a-31: chos rnams kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid du thugs su
T03D3808:46a-32: chud pas yang dag pa'i don ma yin par yongs
T03D3808:46a-34: don dam pa brjod du med pa ni dran pa dang /
T03D3808:46a-35: shes rab gnyis kyi spyod yul ma yin pas dran
T03D3808:46a-36: pa nye bar gzhag pa'i mtshan nyid ni don dam
T03D3808:46a-37: par yod pa ma yin par rtogs pa la shes
T03D3808:46a-38: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te
T03D3808:46a-39: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs
T03D3808:46a-41: de bas na 'bum pa las kyang dran pa nye
T03D3808:46a-42: bar gzhag pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir zhes
T03D3808:46a-44: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos bsgom pa 'di yang
T03D3808:46a-45: 'og nas theg pa chen po bstan pa las rgyas
T03D3808:46a-46: par ston to // de bzhin du yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams la yang sbyar bar bya ste /
T03D3808:46b-0: yang dag pa'i spong ba la sogs @46b pa'i mtshan nyid kun rdzob tsam du zad kyi /
T03D3808:46b-1: don dam par yang dag pa'i spong ba la sogs
T03D3808:46b-2: pa'i mtshan nyid dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
T03D3808:46b-3: yin pas yang dag pa'i spong ba la sogs pa
T03D3808:46b-4: dmigs su med pa'i ngo bo nyid du yongs su
T03D3808:46b-5: mkhyen pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3808:46b-7: byang chub kyi phyogs rnams yongs su rdzogs par mdzad do zhes bshad do //
T03D3808:46b-8: stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin bsgom par bya'o
T03D3808:46b-9: zhes bya ba la rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum
T03D3808:46b-10: ni mya ngan las 'das pa thog par byed pa
T03D3808:46b-11: yin pa'i phyir / byang chub kyi phyogs bsgom pa
T03D3808:46b-12: dang mthun pas na byang chub kyi phyogs nyid kyi
T03D3808:46b-14: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i skabs su gtogs pas ting nge 'dzin gsum zhes brjod do //
T03D3808:46b-15: de la stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin zhes
T03D3808:46b-16: bya ba ni yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid kun
T03D3808:46b-17: brtags pa'i mtshan nyid kyis stong pa la kun brtags
T03D3808:46b-18: pa'i rnam pa des stong ngo zhes stong pa'i rnam
T03D3808:46b-19: par bsgom pa na sems rtse gcig pa nyid du
T03D3808:46b-20: gyur pa la stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin
T03D3808:46b-21: zhes bya'o // brjod du med pa'i don dam pa
T03D3808:46b-22: de nyid nam mkha' bzhin du gzugs la sogs pa'i
T03D3808:46b-23: mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba /
T03D3808:46b-24: mtshan ma'i rnam pa med pa'i mtshan nyid spros pa
T03D3808:46b-25: thams cad nye bar zhi ba yin pas zhi ba'i
T03D3808:46b-26: rnam par bsgom pa na sems rtse gcig tu gyur
T03D3808:46b-27: pa la mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes
T03D3808:46b-28: bya'o // de bzhin du khams gsum pa rnams dngos
T03D3808:46b-29: po med pa ngo bo nyid kyi rnam par gzigs
T03D3808:46b-30: pas chos thams cad la mi mthun pa'i 'du shes
T03D3808:46b-32: phyi ma la smon pa'i gnas su mi byed par
T03D3808:46b-33: yang dag par rjes su gzigs pa na sems rtse
T03D3808:46b-34: gcig tu gyur pa la smon pa med pa'i ting
T03D3808:46b-36: de'i 'og tu bsam gtan bzhi dang zhes bya ba
T03D3808:46b-37: la sogs pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par
T03D3808:46b-38: byed pa'i spyod pa bstan te /
T03D3808:46b-39: sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba de yang 'jig rten pa dang /
T03D3808:46b-41: bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin gyi phyogs dang /
T03D3808:46b-42: mngon par shes pa'i phyogs dang /
T03D3808:47a-1: chos rnams kyis bya dgos pas phyogs kyi chos gsum char yang der 'dus te /
T03D3808:47a-2: de la bsam gtan la sogs pa'i chos thams cad
T03D3808:47a-3: dang por sems can la phan par bya ba'i phyir
T03D3808:47a-5: phyis don dam par yongs su btsal nas bsam gtan
T03D3808:47a-6: la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par zhen
T03D3808:47a-7: par mi mdzad par snying rje dang thabs mkhas pa
T03D3808:47a-8: gnyis kyis yang kun rdzob nyid la dmigs nas sems
T03D3808:47a-9: can la phan par byed pa'i phyir sems can yongs
T03D3808:47a-10: su smin par mdzad pa'i spyod pa rnam par gzhag
T03D3808:47a-11: go // de la skyo ba rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba ni /
T03D3808:47a-23: bdag med ces bya ba la sogs pa yid byung
T03D3808:47a-24: bar 'gyur pa'i gnas rnams la dmigs nas nyes dmigs
T03D3808:47a-25: su mthong bas skyo ba yin la byed pa ni
T03D3808:47a-26: skyo ba rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o //
T03D3808:47a-27: byang chub sems dpa'i skyo ba rjes su dran pa
T03D3808:47a-28: ni chos thams cad bdag med cing dngos po med
T03D3808:47a-29: pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa las /
T03D3808:47a-30: byis pa rnams kyis snying po can du blo bskyed

T03D3808:81a-11: bzhi bcu gnyis pa dag ni sbyin pa dang tshul
T03D3808:81a-12: khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lhur len cing
T03D3808:81a-13: / de bzhin du tshe rabs kun du 'khor los sgyur bar gyur nas /
T03D3808:81a-14: rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu chen po dang ldan pas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed pa dang /
T03D3808:81a-15: mchod par byed cing gnas so //
T03D3808:81a-16: bzhi bcu gsum pa dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing /
T03D3808:81a-17: sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi snang ba thams cad kyis
T03D3808:81a-18: sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas nas sangs
T03D3808:81a-19: rgyas kyi chos kyi snang ba nyid kyis bdag nyid
T03D3808:81a-20: kyang yongs su smin par byed cing mngon par rdzogs
T03D3808:81a-21: par sangs rgyas kyi bar du gnas so //
T03D3808:81a-22: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams bstan nas /
T03D3808:81a-23: sh'a ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
T03D3808:81a-24: dpa' chen po rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la
T03D3808:81a-25: yang dag par byung ba yin no zhes bya ba
T03D3808:81a-26: gsungs te / 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
T03D3808:81a-27: kyi myu gu sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'phel ba'i
T03D3808:81a-28: rim pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go
T03D3808:81a-29: gsungs te / // de'i 'og tu bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa'i skabs dbye ba'i phyir /
T03D3808:81a-30: byang chub sems dpa' de dag chad mar mdzad de /
T03D3808:81a-31: sh'a ri'i bu de lta bas na byang chub sems
T03D3808:81a-32: dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
T03D3808:81a-33: tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
T03D3808:81a-34: kha na mtho ba dang bcas pa'i lus dang ngag
T03D3808:81a-35: dang yid kyi las rnams kyi go mi dbye'o zhes
T03D3808:81a-36: gsungs so // gnas brtan nyid kyis de nyid bzung ste /
T03D3808:81b-0: @81b bshad pa'i skabs dbye ba'i phyir /
T03D3808:81b-1: bcom ldan 'das lus kyi las kha na ma tho
T03D3808:81b-2: ba dang bcas pa gang lags zhes bya ba la
T03D3808:81b-4: de'i 'og tu bcom ldan 'das kyis lus dang ngag
T03D3808:81b-5: dang yid du dmigs pa'i 'du shes pa bka' ma
T03D3808:81b-6: stsal bar lus gang gis lus kyi las brtsam par
T03D3808:81b-7: bya'o // ngag gang dang yid gang gis las brtsam par bya snyam du sems na /
T03D3808:81b-8: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i rtsom pa'i skyon yin no zhes bstan to //
T03D3808:81b-9: de dag nyid lus dang ngag dang yid kyi gnas ngan len yin no //
T03D3808:81b-10: 'di ltar lus dang ngag dang yid mi dmigs pas
T03D3808:81b-11: mi dmigs pa 'di nyid gnas ngan len sbyong ba
T03D3808:81b-13: de'i 'og tu gal te byang chub sems dpa' sa rab tu dga' ba la gnas nas kyang /
T03D3808:81b-14: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la rjes su spyod cing /
T03D3808:81b-15: nyan thos kyi sems dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sems
T03D3808:81b-16: yongs su spangs nas dus thams cad du sems can
T03D3808:81b-17: thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems nye bar
T03D3808:81b-18: gnas te / de lta bus kyang gnas ngan len sbyangs par 'gyur ro zhes bstan to //
T03D3808:81b-19: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
T03D3808:81b-20: po rnams kyi byang chub kyi lam gang lags zhes
T03D3808:81b-21: bya ba ni byang chub kyi lam yongs su sbyong
T03D3808:81b-22: ba zhes bya ba pha rol tu phyin pa las
T03D3808:81b-23: tha mi dad par brjod pa'i phyir zhus pa'o //
T03D3808:81b-24: de'i 'og tu sh'a ri'i bu byang chub kyi lam
T03D3808:81b-25: gang la spyod na zhes bya ba la sogs pas
T03D3808:81b-26: ni mi dmigs pa'i rnal 'byor byang chub kyi lam
T03D3808:81b-28: de nas yang bar skabs su byang chub kyi lam rnam pa gnyis bstan te /
T03D3808:81b-29: mi dmigs par sbyor ba dang /
T03D3808:81b-30: rlom sems med par sbyor ba'o //
T03D3808:81b-31: 'gres de gnyis ni mi dmigs pas rlom sems med
T03D3808:81b-32: pa'i phyir sbyor ba gong ma ni sbyor ba phyi
T03D3808:81b-34: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi yin gyi /
T03D3808:81b-35: byang chub sems dpa'i ma yin no snyam du bsams nas /
T03D3808:81b-36: gnas brtan gyis bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
T03D3808:81b-37: sems dpa' chen po'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i
T03D3808:81b-38: ye shes gang lags zhes zhus pa dang /
T03D3808:82a-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis ye shes de dang ldan pa @82a * //
T03D3808:82a-1: ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas sa brgyad pa
T03D3808:82a-2: la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes de
T03D3808:82a-3: lta bu skye ba de ni rang bzhin yin te
T03D3808:82a-4: rnam par smin pa'i ye shes so zhes bstan to
T03D3808:82a-5: // rnam par smin pa'i ye shes kyis ni pha
T03D3808:82a-6: rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa thams cad yongs
T03D3808:82a-8: de dag la rtsol ba'i yid la byed pa mi 'byung ste /
T03D3808:82a-9: ye shes de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir /
T03D3808:82a-10: rgyu la 'bras bu btags nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes zhes bya'o //
T03D3808:82a-11: de'i 'og tu gzugs thams cad la 'jug pa'i shes pa ni sha'i mig go //
T03D3808:82a-12: ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad shes pa ni lha'i mig go //
T03D3808:82a-13: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni shes rab kyi mig go //
T03D3808:82a-14: gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa ma gtogs
T03D3808:82a-15: pa'i shes pa dgu po dag ni chos kyi mig
T03D3808:82a-16: go // rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi
T03D3808:82a-17: ye shes ni sangs rgyas kyi spyan yin no zhes
T03D3808:82a-18: de dag gi rnam par dbye ba bstan to //
T03D3808:82a-19: de'i 'og tu mngon par shes pas gnas pa la /
T03D3808:82a-20: mngon par shes pas thams cad la yang /
T03D3808:82a-21: sngar kun rdzob kyi shes pas mngon par shes pa la gnas pa bstan nas /
T03D3808:82a-22: shin tu yongs su rdzogs pa yin par bstan pa'i
T03D3808:82a-23: phyir phyis don dam pa'i shes pas rnam par mi
T03D3808:82a-24: rtog pa yin par bstan to //
T03D3808:82a-25: shin tu rnam par dag pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir /
T03D3808:82a-26: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gnas pa thams cad
T03D3808:82a-27: kyang kun rdzob kyi shes pa yongs su rdzogs par
T03D3808:82a-28: byas nas / phyis don dam par mi dmigs par byed de /
T03D3808:82a-29: de'i phyir shin tu yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
T03D3808:82a-30: shin tu rnam par dag par 'gyur ro //
T03D3808:82a-31: de bas na thams cad kyi tha mar sh'a ri'i
T03D3808:82a-32: bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
T03D3808:82a-33: chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3808:82a-35: mngon par shes pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed cing yongs su dag par byed de /
T03D3808:82a-36: mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su dag pas rnam
T03D3808:82a-37: pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do
T03D3808:82a-39: des gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur zhes bya ba ni rdzu 'phrul gyis so //
T03D3808:82b-0: gang rlom sems su byed ces bya ba ni @82b rdzu 'phrul bya ba'i cho ga'o //
T03D3808:82b-1: gang gis rlom sems su byed ces bya ba ni rdzu 'phrul bya ba shes pa ste /
T03D3808:82b-2: des rdzu 'phrul de dag mi dmigs so //
T03D3808:82b-3: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya ba ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
T03D3808:82b-4: rang bzhin dben pa zhes bya ba ni shin tu yongs su dag pa nyid do //
T03D3808:82b-5: rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa zhes bya ba ni 'dus ma byas pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
T03D3808:82b-6: de rdzu 'phrul du sems pa yang mi bskyed do
T03D3808:82b-7: zhes bya ba ni de ni rdzu 'phrul yin no
T03D3808:82b-9: rdzu 'phrul mngon par sgrub par sems pa'o zhes bya
T03D3808:82b-10: ba ni rdzu 'phrul 'di dag mngon par bsgrub par
T03D3808:82b-12: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
T03D3808:82b-13: po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3808:82b-15: gang dag mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir /
T03D3808:82b-16: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te /
T03D3808:82b-17: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong
T03D3808:82b-18: ba dag kyang yod do zhes bya bas ni rnam
T03D3808:82b-19: par mi rtog pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug
T03D3808:82b-20: car la gnas kyang rung pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3808:82b-21: re re la gnas kyang rung ste /
T03D3808:82b-22: byang chub kyi lam sbyong bar byed do //
T03D3808:82b-23: sh'a ri'i bu yod do zhes bya ba la sogs
T03D3808:82b-24: pas ni de dag gi mos pa tha dad pa
T03D3808:82b-25: bstan to // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
T03D3808:82b-26: kyi phyir zhes bya bas ni sgro 'dogs pa dang
T03D3808:82b-27: bstan to // / skur pa 'debs pa'i mtha' spangs so //
T03D3808:82b-28: yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba
T03D3808:82b-29: ni 'khor gsum la mngon par zhen pa med do
T03D3808:82b-30: // gang gi phyir de 'dzin pa med pa yin
T03D3808:82b-31: pa de'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3808:82b-32: la gnas nas byang chub kyi lam la sbyong bar
T03D3808:82b-33: // byed do // 'ong ba med pa dang 'gro
T03D3808:82b-34: ba med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rnam pa
T03D3808:82b-35: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong bar byed
T03D3808:82b-37: gal te lam yod na 'ong ba dang 'gro ba'i
T03D3808:82b-38: 'os kyang yod par 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa
T03D3808:82b-39: las dgongs nas / de dag med pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes gsungs te /
T03D3808:82b-40: nyan thos kyi theg pa las chos thams cad ni
T03D3808:82b-41: skye ba na yang gang nas kyang 'ong ba med
T03D3808:82b-42: la / 'gag pa na yang gang du yang 'gro ba med do zhes 'byung ba dang /
T03D3808:82b-43: theg pa chen po las skye ba dang 'gag pa
T03D3808:82b-44: med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po la 'ong ba
T03D3808:83a-1: las rnam par grol ba zhes bya'o //
T03D3808:83a-2: 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni chos
T03D3808:83a-3: rnams la chos su mngon par zhen pa ni yongs
T03D3808:83a-4: su 'dzin pa'o // sbyin pa ni yongs su 'dzin
T03D3808:83a-5: pa yod pa'i phyir yongs su gdags so zhes bya
T03D3808:83a-6: ba ni ser sna yongs su 'dzin pa'o //
T03D3808:83a-7: sbyin pa ni yongs su 'dzin pa nye bar bzung
T03D3808:83a-8: ba las gdags so zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T03D3808:83a-10: 'jig rten na yang ser sna yod dang sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i ming 'byung la /
T03D3808:83a-11: 'chal ba'i tshul khrims la sogs pa yod na /
T03D3808:83a-12: tshul khrims la sogs pa'i ming du 'gyur ro //
T03D3808:83a-13: gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' la ser sna
T03D3808:83a-14: la sogs pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi blo med
T03D3808:83a-15: pa de'i phyir sbyin pa la sogs pa'i blo yang
T03D3808:83a-17: de ni brgal to zhes bya bar rlom sems med do //
T03D3808:83a-18: mi brgal to zhes bya bar rlom sems med do
T03D3808:83a-19: zhes bya ba ni ser sna la sogs pa las
T03D3808:83a-20: bdag brgal to zhes bya ba'am /
T03D3808:83a-21: ma brgal to zhes bya bar mi sems te /
T03D3808:83a-22: de dag nyid shin tu med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3808:83a-23: sbyin pa dang ser sna zhes bya bar rlom sems
T03D3808:83a-24: med do zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni de
T03D3808:83a-25: nyid bstan te / mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang gnyen
T03D3808:83a-26: po gnyi gar yang mi sems so zhes bya ba'i
T03D3808:83a-27: nyid bstan te / tha tshig go // bdag la spyos so zhes bya ba'am /
T03D3808:83a-28: bdag la phyag byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems
T03D3808:83a-29: med do zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni 'jig
T03D3808:83a-30: rten gyi chos brgyad kyi rlom sems med do zhes
T03D3808:83a-31: ston to // sh'a ri'i bu skye ba med do
T03D3808:83a-32: zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya
T03D3808:83a-34: sems can thams cad la mnyam pa nyid ces bya
T03D3808:83a-35: ba ni gang zag stong pa nyid kyi btang snyoms
T03D3808:83a-36: tshad med pa'o // chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid
T03D3808:83a-37: ces bya ba ni chos stong pa nyid kyis dbu
T03D3808:83a-38: mar gnas pa'i btang snyoms te /
T03D3808:83a-39: 'di ni rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba med pa'i btang snyoms zhes bya'o //

T03D3808:83a-41: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsngags pa dang /
T03D3808:83a-42: de la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bsngags pa dang /
T03D3808:83a-44: byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa dang /
T03D3808:83b-4: 'di dag thams cad ni gzhung las 'byung ba bzhin te /
T03D3808:83b-6: de ltar tshig dang pos mdor bstan pa bshad do //
T03D3808:83b-7: sh'a ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
T03D3808:83b-8: dpa' chen po chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad
T03D3808:83b-9: du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'dod pas
T03D3808:83b-10: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson
T03D3808:83b-11: par bya'o zhes bya ba de la /
T03D3808:83b-12: gang gi phyir brtson par bya ba dang /
T03D3808:83b-13: ji ltar brtson par bya ba dang /
T03D3808:83b-14: brtson par byed pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa dang /
T03D3808:83b-15: brtson par byed pa gang yin pa rnams kyis rab
T03D3808:83b-16: tu dbye ba de dag bcom ldan 'das dang gnas
T03D3808:83b-17: brtan sh'a ri'i bus rgyas par bstan nas /
T03D3808:83b-18: da ni brtson pa la gdams pa gang yin pa dang /
T03D3808:83b-19: brtson pa'i phan yon gang yin pa la sogs pa bshad par bya ba rnam pa bzhi las /
T03D3808:83b-20: gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis brtson pa la gdams pa bstan to //
T03D3808:83b-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang thabs mkhas pas de ltar
T03D3808:83b-22: yongs su smin par bya ba'i 'dul ba las brtsams
T03D3808:83b-23: te bstan to // de nyid kyi phyir sh'a ri'i
T03D3808:83b-24: bus 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi thabs
T03D3808:83b-25: la mkhas pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems
T03D3808:83b-26: dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol

T03D3808:83b-30: te bstan to // 'chad do // / spobs pa'i stobs bskyed pas zhes bya ba ni /
T03D3808:83b-31: nyan thos rnams kyi yul ni nyan thos rnams kyis shes na /
T03D3808:83b-32: ci'i phyir nyan thos rnams la the tshom 'di 'byung zhe na /
T03D3808:83b-33: de la nyes pa med de /

T03D3808:83b-35: bskal pa grangs med pa nas bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs bsags la /
T03D3808:83b-36: chos zab mo la bzod pa thob par grags pa ste /
T03D3808:83b-37: de bas na thams cad kyang de ltar the tshom du gyur to //

T03D3808:83b-39: par bstan na gzung bar 'gyur ba ma yin pa'i
T03D3808:83b-40: skyon du 'gyur ba bsal ba'i phyir /
T03D3808:83b-41: 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' yin gyi /
T03D3808:83b-42: bdag gi tshig ni ma yin no zhes bsal to //
T03D3808:84a-3: brjod kyang rung zhes bya ba ni 'dul ba rnam pa gsum po rnams las /
T03D3808:84a-5: rgyas pa rnams su dbye ba'am /
T03D3808:84a-6: yang na bdag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /
T03D3808:84a-7: gzhan gyi lhag pa'i bsam pa'i skabs dang /
T03D3808:84a-9: rnam pa gsum gyi phyir rnam pa gsum du bstan to //
T03D3808:84a-10: da ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
T03D3808:84a-11: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson
T03D3808:84a-12: par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tshig dang po la bstan
T03D3808:84a-13: pa gang yin pa de bstan pa'i phyir de nyid
T03D3808:84a-14: bzung nas / bcom ldan 'das kyis rab 'byor khyod
T03D3808:84a-15: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la
T03D3808:84a-16: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtsom ste
T03D3808:84a-17: bzung nas / / ci nas kyang byang chub sems
T03D3808:84a-18: dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha
T03D3808:84a-19: rol tu phyin pa la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur

T03D3808:84a-21: bzung nas / / phye ba dang / gnas brtan
T03D3808:84a-22: rab 'byor gyis ming dang brdar gdags pas brtson pa
T03D3808:84a-24: sems can mi dmigs pas brtson pa la gdams pa dang /
T03D3808:84a-25: tshig bla dags mi dmigs pas brtson pa la gdams pa dang /
T03D3808:84a-26: chos thams cad dmigs su med pas brtson pa la gdams pa dang /
T03D3808:84a-27: gdams pa bzhi skabs dbye ba'i phyir /
T03D3808:84a-28: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
T03D3808:84a-29: po zhes bgyi ba chos gang gi tshig bla dags
T03D3808:84a-30: lags zhes bya ba la sogs pa zhus so //

T03D3808:84a-32: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i chos ni gang
T03D3808:84a-33: yang med cing de nyid shes rab kyi pha rol
T03D3808:84a-34: tu phyin pa zhes kyang gsungs la /
T03D3808:84a-35: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyang gang yang med na /
T03D3808:84a-36: de la chos 'di gnyis dmigs su med bzhin du

T03D3808:91a-30: mi dmigs pa de nyid rgyas par bstan to //
T03D3808:91a-33: skye mched dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag rnams dang /
T03D3808:91a-39: srog la sogs pa bcu gsum dang /
T03D3808:91a-44: nyan thos kyi chos rnams dang /
T03D3808:91a-46: rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /
T03D3808:91a-48: byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang /
T03D3808:91b-1: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /
T03D3808:91b-2: byang chub ces bya ba ste /
T03D3808:91b-3: chos de dag thams cad bstan to //
T03D3808:91b-7: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag rnams kyis
T03D3808:91b-8: ni phyi dang nang gi chos thams cad bsdus so
T03D3808:91b-11: gti mug rnams kyis ni nyon mongs pa dang /
T03D3808:91b-12: gnas ngan len gyi phyogs thams cad bsdus so //
T03D3808:91b-13: bdag dang sems can la sogs pas ni shin tu med cing btags pa'i chos rnams bsdus so //
T03D3808:91b-14: khams gsum gyis ni 'khor ba'i chos thams cad bsdus so //
T03D3808:91b-15: nyan thos la sogs pas ni rnam par byang ba dkar po'i chos thams cad bsdus so //
T03D3808:91b-16: sems dang sems kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba des ni 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa drug dang /
T03D3808:91b-17: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa dang /
T03D3808:91b-18: de dang mtshungs par ldan pa rnams bstan to //
T03D3808:91b-19: yid dang yid kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba des ni nyon mongs pa'i yid dang /
T03D3808:91b-20: de dang mtshungs par ldan pa rnams bstan to //
T03D3808:91b-21: de ltar brtson pa'i gdams pa lnga pa ste rdzogs
T03D3808:91b-22: par byas nas de'i 'og tu brtson pa'i yon tan
T03D3808:91b-23: zhes bya ba drug pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T03D3808:91b-24: bcom ldan 'das gzugs yongs su rtogs par 'tshal ba'i
T03D3808:91b-25: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab
T03D3808:91b-26: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o
T03D3808:91b-27: zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
T03D3808:91b-28: 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3808:91b-29: 'di las gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
T03D3808:91b-30: chen po rnams kyis nyan thos dang /
T03D3808:91b-33: sangs rgyas kyis la bslab par bya ba'i theg pa
T03D3808:91b-34: gsum po dag rgya cher bstan to zhes bya ba'i
T03D3808:91b-35: gzhung gi tshig mang pos bstan to //
T03D3808:91b-36: 'di la yang phan yon rnam pa bzhi ste /
T03D3808:91b-37: yongs su shes par bya ba'i chos rnams yongs su shes pa dang /
T03D3808:91b-38: spang bar bya ba rnams spangs pa dang /
T03D3808:91b-39: yongs su rdzogs par bya ba rnams bsgoms pas yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
T03D3808:91b-40: mngon sum du bya ba rnams thob pas mngon sum du byas pa'o //
T03D3808:92a-0: de la bcom ldan 'das gzugs yongs su rtogs par @92a * //
T03D3808:92a-1: 'tshal bas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni yongs su shes pa'i phan yon bstan te /
T03D3808:92a-5: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag rnams yongs su shes par bya'o zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3808:92a-8: gti mug spang par 'tshal bas zhes bya ba la
T03D3808:92a-9: sogs pa yongs su spangs pa'i yon tan bstan te
T03D3808:92a-13: lta ba dang mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams spang par bya zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3808:92a-14: yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phan yon ni dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang /
T03D3808:92a-15: pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa sangs rgyas
T03D3808:92a-16: kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i mthar thug pa'i bar rnams
T03D3808:92a-17: yongs su rdzogs pa'i tshig gis bstan to //
T03D3808:92a-18: mngon sum du bya ba'i phan yon ni gzungs kyi
T03D3808:92a-19: sgo dang ting nge 'dzin rnams thob pa zhes bya
T03D3808:92a-21: de nas yang tha mar sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i phan yon dang /
T03D3808:92a-22: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i phan yon bstan te /
T03D3808:92a-23: de gnyis kyang yongs su rdzogs pa'i mtshan nyid sngar smos pa de dag nyid de /
T03D3808:92a-24: skyon chen po'i skabs dbye ba'i phyir tha mar bstan to //
T03D3808:92a-25: skyon chen po zhes bya ba ni spyi bor gyur pa'am /
T03D3808:92a-26: gtso bor gyur pa'i nyes pa'am /
T03D3808:92a-27: lhag mthong gi mtshan nyid spyi bor gyur pa'i gnas
T03D3808:92a-28: skabs kyi skyon yin pas skyon chen po zhes bya'o
T03D3808:92a-29: // mthun pa'i chos la sred pa zhes bya ba
T03D3808:92a-30: ni phyin ci log spong pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir
T03D3808:92a-32: chos su rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i phyir chos la sred pa zhes bya'o //
T03D3808:92a-33: mngon par zhen cing gnas te kun tu shes pa'o
T03D3808:92a-34: zhes bya ba ni chen por gyur pa'i gnas skabs
T03D3808:92a-35: na rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i lta bas
T03D3808:92a-36: mngon par zhen par byed do //
T03D3808:92a-37: 'bring gi gnas skabs na sems kyis gnas par byed do //
T03D3808:92a-38: chung ngu'i gnas skabs na 'du shes kyis kun tu shes par byed do //
T03D3808:92a-39: chos rnam pa gsum ni phyin ci log dang mthun pa ste /
T03D3808:92a-42: lta ba phyin ci log go //
T03D3808:92b-0: chos la sred pa @92b yang rnam pa gnyis su bstan te /
T03D3808:92b-1: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par lta ba'i chos nyid dang /
T03D3808:92b-3: skyon med pa zhes bya ba'i sgra ni med pa'i don te /
T03D3808:92b-4: skyon gyi dngos po yod pa ma yin pa la skyon med pa zhes bya'o //
T03D3808:92b-5: nang stong pa nyid la phyi stong pa nyid yang
T03D3808:92b-6: dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo zhes bya ba
T03D3808:92b-7: la nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid
T03D3808:92b-8: kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong gi phyi stong pa
T03D3808:92b-9: nyid la sogs pa stong pa nyid gzhan dag gis
T03D3808:92b-10: stong par byas pa ni ma yin te /
T03D3808:92b-11: de bas na nang stong pa nyid la de stong par bya ba'i phyir /
T03D3808:92b-12: phyi stong pa nyid mi tshol lo zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T03D3808:92b-13: de bzhin du phyi stong pa nyid la yang nang stong pa nyid do //
T03D3808:92b-14: stong par bya ba'i phyir mi tshol te /
T03D3808:92b-15: ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T03D3808:92b-16: de ltar slob pa'i tshe gzugs shes par bya ste /
T03D3808:92b-17: de la rlom sems su yang mi bya'o zhes bya
T03D3808:92b-18: ba ni chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong
T03D3808:92b-19: pa'i phyir ming tsam du zad par shes par byas
T03D3808:92b-20: te / ming tsam du zad par shes pa des
T03D3808:92b-21: kyang chos rnams la rlom sems su mi bya ba'i
T03D3808:92b-22: te / tha tshig go // de ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du bstan nas /
T03D3808:92b-23: de nas yang byang chub sems dpas byang chub kyi
T03D3808:92b-24: sems kyis kyang rlom sems su mi bya'o zhes bya
T03D3808:92b-25: bas byang chub kyi sems yon tan dang bcas pa
T03D3808:92b-26: bstan to // 'di ltar sems de ni sems ma
T03D3808:92b-27: yin te zhes bya ba la sems zhes bya ba'i
T03D3808:92b-28: sgra ni kun brtags pa'i sems la bya'o //
T03D3808:92b-29: yongs su grub pa bla na med pa yang dag
T03D3808:92b-30: par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems chos kyi skur
T03D3808:92b-31: gyur pa ni / yongs su rtog pa dang rnam
T03D3808:92b-32: par rtog pa'i mtshan nyid thams cad las 'das pas
T03D3808:92b-33: sems kyi mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir sems ma yin
T03D3808:92b-34: gyur pa ni / pa zhes bya'o // de bas
T03D3808:92b-35: na sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba zhes bya
T03D3808:92b-36: gyur pa ni / pa zhes bya'o // ba gsungs
T03D3808:92b-37: te / chos kyi sku'i sems kyi rang bzhin ni
T03D3808:92b-38: gyur pa ni / pa zhes bya'o // ba gsungs
T03D3808:92b-39: te / 'od gsal ba'o // de bas na sems
T03D3808:92b-40: ma yin zhes bya ba ni kun brtags pa'i sems
T03D3808:92b-41: ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T03D3808:92b-42: 'dod chags dang ldan pa yang ma yin bral ba
T03D3808:92b-43: yang ma yin zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin 'od
T03D3808:93a-0: sngon so so'i skye bo'i gnas skabs na 'dod chags dang zhe sdang la @93a * //
T03D3808:93a-1: sogs pa skye ba'i dus na yang nam mkha' bzhin
T03D3808:93a-2: du dri ma thams cad kyis ma gos pa'i phyir
T03D3808:93a-3: bden pa yang ma yin zhes bya'o //
T03D3808:93a-4: phyis sangs rgyas su gyur pa'i tshe yang sems de
T03D3808:93a-5: glo bur gyi nyon mongs pa dang bral bas rang
T03D3808:93a-6: bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa nyid la gnas pa'i
T03D3808:93a-7: phyir dri ma de dag shin tu mi skye bas
T03D3808:93a-8: / sprin la sogs pa de dag dang mi ldan
T03D3808:93a-9: pa'i nam mkha' bzhin du 'od gsal ba'i phyir bral
T03D3808:93a-10: ba yang ma yin no zhes bya'o //
T03D3808:93a-11: gal te sngon ldan par gyur na ni phyis bral bar yang 'gyur ba zhig na /
T03D3808:93a-12: 'di ltar sngon dri ma dang bcas pa'i gnas skabs na yang /
T03D3808:93a-13: rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pas de dag dang ldan pa yang ma yin /
T03D3808:93a-14: de'i phyir phyis kyang de dag dang bral ba yang ma yin no zhes bya'o //
T03D3808:93a-15: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor sems gang la sems
T03D3808:93a-16: ma yin no zhes bya ba'i sems de yod dam
T03D3808:93a-17: zhes bya ba ci las dgongs she na /
T03D3808:93a-18: 'di ltar sems de sems ma yin no zhes bya
T03D3808:93a-19: ba la gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis de'i gnas skabs
T03D3808:93a-20: na yang sems zhes bya ba'i sgrar brjod pas sems
T03D3808:93a-21: de sems ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid du yod par
T03D3808:93a-22: gyur to snyam nas dris pa'o //
T03D3808:93a-23: de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis de la bdag ni sems kyi mtshan nyid dam /
T03D3808:93a-24: sems ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid yod do zhes ni
T03D3808:93a-25: mi smra'o brjod du med pa'i bdag nyid du rnam
T03D3808:93a-26: par gnas pa shin tu yongs su dag pa la
T03D3808:93a-27: tha dad du brjod pa'i dus na rnam pa gzhan
T03D3808:93a-28: du brjod du mi rung ba'i phyir /
T03D3808:93a-29: sngon gyi shugs kyi rjes su 'brang bas sems zhes bya ba dang /
T03D3808:93a-30: sems ma yin zhes bya bar smra'o snyam du dgongs nas /
T03D3808:93a-31: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gang sems ma
T03D3808:93a-32: yin pa de la yod pa'ang med pas dmigs pa'am
T03D3808:93a-33: yod par 'gyur ram zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T03D3808:93a-34: sems ma yin pa'i gnas skabs na yod pa'am med pa gnyis kar yang brjod par mi bya ste /
T03D3808:93a-35: mtha' gnyis la brten par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro snyam du dgongs pa'o //
T03D3808:93a-36: de'i phyir tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no zhes gsungs so //
T03D3808:93a-37: de nas yang gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis gal te
T03D3808:93a-38: de'i gnas skabs na mtha' gnyis kyis 'jigs pas gnyi
T03D3808:93a-39: ga ltar yang brjod du mi rung na /
T03D3808:93b-0: @93b ci'i phyir khyod 'di skad du 'dri zhes khyod
T03D3808:93b-1: kyis brgal zhing brtags pa 'di cig rigs sam zhes
T03D3808:93b-3: de skad gsungs pa dang gnas brtan sh'a ri'i bus
T03D3808:93b-4: gal te yod pa dang med pa dag med na
T03D3808:93b-5: / de lta na ni sems ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid kyang med par 'gyur na /
T03D3808:93b-6: ci'i phyir sems ma yin pa zhes smra snyam du dgongs nas /
T03D3808:93b-7: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor sems ma yin pa zhes bya ba de gang yin zhes gsungs so //
T03D3808:93b-8: de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis /
T03D3808:93b-9: de la bdag ni sems ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid
T03D3808:93b-10: gzhan du gyur pas bsams te sems ma yin pa
T03D3808:93b-11: zhes bya ba mi smra'i sngon dri ma dang bcas
T03D3808:93b-12: pa'i gnas skabs na gang 'gyur ba dang /
T03D3808:93b-13: rnam pa rtog pa can yin pa'i phyir de la
T03D3808:93b-14: sems zhes bya ba da ni de lta bu med
T03D3808:93b-15: pa'i phyir sems zhes bya ba'i dngos po med pa
T03D3808:93b-16: tsam zhig khas blangs nas sems ma yin zhes bya
T03D3808:93b-17: ba brjod par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
T03D3808:93b-18: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu sems ma yin
T03D3808:93b-19: pa ni 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa
T03D3808:93b-20: med pa'o zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T03D3808:93b-21: sngon sems kyi gnas skabs ltar 'gyur ba dang /
T03D3808:93b-22: rnam par rtog pa can gyi dngos po med pa
T03D3808:93b-23: la 'dir sems ma yin pa zhes bya'o zhes bya
T03D3808:93b-25: de skad smras pa dang gnas brtan sh'a ri'i bus
T03D3808:93b-26: ci de'i gnas skabs na sems kho na 'gyur ba
T03D3808:93b-27: med cing / rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
T03D3808:93b-28: 'on te chos thams cad kyang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin snyam nas /
T03D3808:93b-29: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ji ltar sems la 'gyur ba med cing /
T03D3808:93b-30: rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du /
T03D3808:93b-31: gzugs la yang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog
T03D3808:93b-32: pa med pa yin nam zhes bya ba la sogs
T03D3808:93b-33: pa dris so // de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor
T03D3808:93b-34: gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nas bla na med
T03D3808:93b-35: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar
T03D3808:93b-36: dag la yang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog
T03D3808:93b-37: pa med do zhes bstan to //
T03D3808:93b-38: bcom ldan 'das kyi sras thugs las skyes pa zhes
T03D3808:93b-39: bya ba ni brdzus te skyes pa'i bu dag ni
T03D3808:93b-40: pha'i snying las skyes pas na thugs las skyes pa'i
T03D3808:93b-41: sras zhes bya'o // yang na sras kyi thu bo la bya ste /
T03D3808:94a-1: brtan 'di yang thugs kyi sems las skyes pas na thugs las skyes pas zhes bya ste /
T03D3808:94a-2: zhi gnas dang lhag mthong yid la byed pa las byung ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3808:94a-3: zhal nas skyes pa zhes bya ba ni bshad pa'i chos las byung ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3808:94a-4: chos las skyes pa zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa'i chos las byung ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3808:94a-5: chos kyi sprul pa zhes bya ba ni lam dang
T03D3808:94a-6: 'bras bu dang rtog pa'i chos rnams las skyes pa'i
T03D3808:94a-7: phyir ro // chos kyi bgo skal la spyod pa
T03D3808:94a-8: zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos
T03D3808:94a-9: kyi bdag por 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3808:94a-10: zang zing gi bgo skal la spyod pa ma yin
T03D3808:94a-11: zhes bya ba ni sred pa spangs pa'i phyir ro
T03D3808:94a-12: // chos rnams la mngon sum gyi ming dang ldan
T03D3808:94a-13: pa zhes bya ba ni chos nyid las gzhan dag
T03D3808:94a-15: lus mngon sum du gyur pa zhes bya ba ni gzugs dang /
T03D3808:94a-16: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa thob pa dang /
T03D3808:94a-17: chos kyi sku mngon sum du byas pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3808:94a-18: nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog
T03D3808:94a-19: ces bya ba ni nyan thos kyi tshul gyi nyon
T03D3808:94a-20: mongs pa'i sgra dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi snyoms
T03D3808:94a-21: par 'jug pa la nyon mongs pa med pa'i snyoms
T03D3808:94a-23: des gnas pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa zhes bya'o //
T03D3808:94a-24: 'di ni rnam par rtog pa'i spros pa thams cad la nyon mongs pa zhes bya ste /
T03D3808:94a-25: de dag med pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog pa'i
T03D3808:94a-26: snyoms par 'jug pa la nyon mongs pa med pa
T03D3808:94a-27: zhes bya ste / des gnas pa la nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa zhes bya'o //
T03D3808:94a-28: de nas gnas brtan sh'a ri'i bus legs so zhes
T03D3808:94a-29: bya ba'i bsngags pa la sogs pas mngon par dga'
T03D3808:94a-30: bar byas nas de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems
T03D3808:94a-31: dpa' phyir mi ldog pa yin par bstan te /
T03D3808:94a-32: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang /
T03D3808:94a-33: byang chub sems dpa'i sa la slob pa thams cad
T03D3808:94a-34: la yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3808:94a-35: 'di'i phan 'dogs pa yin par brjod nas 'di ltar
T03D3808:94a-36: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las
T03D3808:94a-37: theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to zhes rjes su
T03D3808:94a-39: brtson pa'i phan yon gyi mjug bsdus so //
T03D3808:94a-40: de ltar brtson pa'i phan yon bstan nas /
T03D3808:94b-0: brtson pa la rnam pa @94b du yod snyam pa
T03D3808:94b-1: la brtson pa'i rab tu dbye ba bstan dgos te
T03D3808:94b-2: / 'di man chad nges par 'byin pa sgrub pa drug bstan to //
T03D3808:94b-3: nges par 'byin pa'i sgrub pa drug ni mtha' gnyis dang bral ba sgrub pa dang /
T03D3808:94b-4: mi gnas par sgrub pa dang /
T03D3808:94b-5: yongs su 'dzin pa med par sgrub pa dang /
T03D3808:94b-6: yongs su brtags pa'i sgrub pa dang /
T03D3808:94b-8: myur du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par sgrub pa ste /
T03D3808:94b-9: 'di ltar de dag nges par 'byin pa yin par
T03D3808:94b-10: yang mjug bsdus nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
T03D3808:94b-11: chen po 'di ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la
T03D3808:94b-12: mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas te /
T03D3808:94b-13: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung zhing /
T03D3808:94b-14: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nye bar
T03D3808:94b-15: 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs pas bcom ldan
T03D3808:94b-17: drug po de dag kyang 'og nas go rims bzhin du so so'i gnas gnas nas ston to //
T03D3808:94b-18: da ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis sgrub pa de drug gi skabs dbye ba'i phyir /
