T03D3808:122a-1: pa stong par 'gyur ba de bzhin du /
T03D3808:122a-2: don dam pa'i rdzas sngon byung ba rnams phyis bor
T03D3808:122a-3: zhing btang ba 'di la stong pa nyid rnam par
T03D3808:122a-5: chos rnams ngo bo nyid kyis med pa de stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T03D3808:122a-6: de la dor ba med pa ni dor ba med
T03D3808:122a-7: pas stong ngo zhes bya ba ni dor ba med
T03D3808:122a-8: pa'i chos ni gang yang med do zhes bya ba'i
T03D3808:122a-9: tha tshig go // rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya ba ni 'dus byas dang /
T03D3808:122a-10: 'dus ma byas rnams kyi rang bzhin chos nyid stong
T03D3808:122a-11: pa nyid gang yin pa de ni nyan thos sam
T03D3808:122a-14: gang gis kyang ma byas ma mdzad de /
T03D3808:122a-15: de bas na rang bzhin zhes bya ba'o //
T03D3808:122a-16: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin de yang rang bzhin gyis stong ste /
T03D3808:122a-17: chos can yod na ni de'i rang bzhin yang 'grub par 'gyur ba zhig na /
T03D3808:122a-18: 'di ltar chos can nyid med na de gang gi
T03D3808:122a-19: rang bzhin du brjod par 'os zhes bya ba'i tha
T03D3808:122a-20: tshig go // de bas na rang bzhin ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T03D3808:122a-21: chos thams cad ni chos thams cad kyis stong ngo
T03D3808:122a-22: zhes bya ba ni don dam par na chos thams
T03D3808:122a-23: cad la chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid med
T03D3808:122a-24: do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T03D3808:122a-25: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba
T03D3808:122a-26: ni chos rnams med na 'di dag gang gis rang
T03D3808:122a-28: de bas na chos rnams kun brtags pa tsam du
T03D3808:122a-29: zad pa'i phyir mtshan nyid 'di dag kyang kun pa
T03D3808:122a-30: rtags pa yin pas med do zhes bya ba'i tha
T03D3808:122a-31: tshig go // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ces
T03D3808:122a-32: bya ba ni dus gsum du rtogs pa'i chos rnams
T03D3808:122a-33: dus gsum gyi bdag nyid du med pa gang yin
T03D3808:122a-34: pa de mi dmigs pa ste /
T03D3808:122a-35: mi dmigs pa de yang mi dmigs pa'i bdag nyid kyis stong gi /
T03D3808:122a-36: mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i chos gzhan du gyur
T03D3808:122a-37: pa ni gang la yang med do zhes bya ba'i
T03D3808:122a-38: tha tshig go // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
T03D3808:122a-39: nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba ni rnam pa
T03D3808:122a-41: de la bshad pa snga ma ni /
T03D3808:122a-42: rab 'byor 'dus pa las byung ba'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid med ces bya ba ste /
T03D3808:122a-43: ji skad bstan par 'gyur zhe na /
T03D3808:122a-44: 'di la chos thams cad skye ba na /
T03D3808:122b-0: rang gi stobs 'ba' zhig gis @122b skye ba ni ma yin gyi /
T03D3808:122b-1: rgyu dang rkyen gyi stobs kyis skye ste /
T03D3808:122b-2: dper na sa bon gyis myu gu skyed pa na
T03D3808:122b-3: rang gi mthu 'ba' zhig gis skyed pa ni ma
T03D3808:122b-4: yin gyi / sa dang chu la sogs pa 'dus
T03D3808:122b-5: pa'i mthus bskyed pa de bzhin du chos thams cad
T03D3808:122b-6: yin gyi / kyang rgyu dang / rkyen tshogs pa'i mthus skye'o //
T03D3808:122b-7: rang gi mthu 'ba' zhig gis skye ba ma yin
T03D3808:122b-8: pa'i phyir rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba kho na'o
T03D3808:122b-9: // chos gzhan la brten te skye ba'i chos gang
T03D3808:122b-10: yin pa de dag ni gzugs su rung ba dang
T03D3808:122b-11: // / myong ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin yin du zin kyang /
T03D3808:122b-12: rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa nyid las skye bar 'gyur bas na 'dus pa las byung ba zhes bya'o //
T03D3808:122b-13: 'dus pa las byung ba gang yin pa de rang
T03D3808:122b-14: gi ngo bo nyid ces brjod par ji ltar nus
T03D3808:122b-15: / de bas na chos thams cad gzhan gyi dngos
T03D3808:122b-16: pos skye ba'i phyir rang gi dngos po med pas
T03D3808:122b-17: ngo bo nyid med pa nyid do //
T03D3808:122b-18: rang gi dngos po med pa nyid kyi phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid ces bya'o //
T03D3808:122b-19: de bas na rab 'byor 'dus pa las byung ba'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid med de /
T03D3808:122b-20: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T03D3808:122b-21: 'di nyid chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid de /
T03D3808:122b-22: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
T03D3808:122b-24: dngos po ni dngos pos stong ngo //
T03D3808:122b-25: dngos po med pa ni dngos po med pas stong ngo zhes bya ba ste /
T03D3808:122b-26: dngos po dang ngo bo nyid ni dngos po dang ngo bo nyid do //
T03D3808:122b-28: ngo bo nyid med pa ni dngos po dang /
T03D3808:122b-29: ngo bo nyid med pa ste /
T03D3808:122b-30: rnam par rtog pa 'di la dngos po med pa
T03D3808:122b-31: zhes bya ba'i sgras ni dngos po yod pa ma
T03D3808:122b-32: yin par rtogs pas dngos po dang /
T03D3808:122b-33: dngos po med pa yang bzung ba yin no //
T03D3808:122b-34: ngo bo nyid med do zhes bya ba'i sgras ni
T03D3808:122b-35: rang gi dngos po ma yin par rtogs pas gzhan
T03D3808:122b-37: rang gi dngos po yang bzung ba yin te /
T03D3808:122b-38: stong pa bzhi po de dag la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
T03D3808:122b-41: dngos po zhes bya ba'i sgra ni 'dus byas kyi chos rnams la bya'o //
T03D3808:122b-42: de'i phyir dngos po ni dngos pos stong ngo zhes gsungs so //
T03D3808:123a-0: dngos po med pa'i sgras ni @123a * //
T03D3808:123a-1: 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la bya ste /
T03D3808:123a-2: de'i phyir dngos po med pa ni dngos po med pas stong ngo zhes gsungs so //
T03D3808:123a-3: de la dngos po'i chos ni dngos po'i bdag nyid dang bral ba dang /
T03D3808:123a-4: dngos po med pa'i chos kyang dngos po med pa'i
T03D3808:123a-5: bdag nyid dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig
T03D3808:123a-6: go // ngo bo nyid ces bya ba ni shes pa dang mthong ba ste /
T03D3808:123a-7: chos rnams kyi kun brtags pa'i gnas skabs yongs su
T03D3808:123a-8: spangs pa'i lhag ma yongs su grub pa'i gnas skabs
T03D3808:123a-9: ni shes pa dang mthong ba'i ngo bo nyid yin
T03D3808:123a-10: pa'i phyir de skad ces bya'o //
T03D3808:123a-11: de la shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni shes pas ma byas la /
T03D3808:123a-12: mthong ba'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang mthong bsam byas te /
T03D3808:123a-14: ngo bo nyid de gnyis kyi stong pa nyid ni
T03D3808:123a-15: rang bzhin yin pas ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
T03D3808:123a-16: ces bya'o // de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /
T03D3808:123a-17: ma byung rung ste zhes bya ba ni /
T03D3808:123a-18: gnas pa'i mtshan nyid de bzhin nyid chos nyid gang yin pa de /
T03D3808:123a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa pha rol gzhan gyis byas pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
T03D3808:123a-20: byed pa po gzhan med la /
T03D3808:123a-21: gzhan gyi dngos po stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
T03D3808:123a-22: de nas yang ting nge 'dzin gyi theg pa chen po'i gnas skabs dbye ba'i phyir /
T03D3808:123a-23: dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T03D3808:123a-24: dpa' bo bzhin du ting nge 'dzin gyi bya ba byed pa dang /
T03D3808:123a-25: ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi spyod yul nyams su myong bar byed pa dang /
T03D3808:123a-26: thams cad du khyab par byed pa gang yin pa de la dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ste /
T03D3808:123a-27: 'di la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams
T03D3808:123a-28: kyi rnam par mi rtog pa zag pa med pa
T03D3808:123a-29: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems ni rtog pa dang
T03D3808:123a-30: bcas pa'i bya ba mi byed pa dang /
T03D3808:123a-31: rnam par g-yeng ba med pa gtso bor byed pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o //
T03D3808:123a-32: ting nge 'dzin de yang bsam gtan gyi ngo bo nyid ma yin te /
T03D3808:123a-33: bsam gtan ni gzugs yod pa na spyod par gtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3808:123a-34: sems kyi bdag nyid du gcig tu zin kyang sngon
T03D3808:123b-0: gyi brtsal ba'i mthus so sor byed pa phan @123b
T03D3808:123b-1: pas na / bya ba byed pa'i dbang gis tha dad du brjod do //
T03D3808:123b-2: de yang gzhan dag gis rtog pa'i spyod yul du mi 'gyur te /
T03D3808:123b-3: so sor rang gis rig pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3808:123b-4: de dag kyang mdo las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin du gzung bar bya ste /
T03D3808:123b-5: de la rigs pas dpyad par bya ba ni ma yin no //
T03D3808:123b-6: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
T03D3808:123b-7: chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste
T03D3808:123b-8: / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ste zhes
T03D3808:123b-9: bya ba ni 'di la dran pa nye bar gnas
T03D3808:123b-10: / pas na / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bshad pa'i phyir /
T03D3808:123b-11: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni lus dang /
T03D3808:123b-13: sems dang chos zhes bya ba dang bzhi la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i sgrar brjod do //
T03D3808:123b-14: de ni dran pa yang yin la /
T03D3808:123b-15: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin pas dran pa
T03D3808:123b-16: nye bar gzhag pa'o zhes bshad pa'i phyir chos bzhi'i
T03D3808:123b-18: bsrung ba'i don du dran pa'i bzhi ste /
T03D3808:123b-19: dmigs pa bzhir gyur pa'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi zhes bya'o //
T03D3808:123b-20: 'di la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa 'di bzhi
T03D3808:123b-21: char theg pa chen po'i tshul du ni sngar bstan
T03D3808:123b-22: to // lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gcig
T03D3808:123b-23: pu ni phyis nyan thos kyi tshul dang mthun par
T03D3808:123b-24: rnam pa drug tu bstan te /
T03D3808:123b-25: nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing
T03D3808:123b-26: gnas zhes bya ba ni gang gi tshe nang gi
T03D3808:123b-27: sems can du bgrangs pa'i lus kyi rjes su lta
T03D3808:123b-29: nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba zhes bya'o //
T03D3808:123b-30: gang gi tshe phyi rol sems can du mi bgrang ba /
T03D3808:123b-31: gzugs kyi lus kyi rjes su lta ba de'i tshe
T03D3808:123b-32: ni phyi'i lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba
T03D3808:123b-33: zhes bya'o // gang gi tshe phyi'i sems can du bgrang ba /
T03D3808:123b-34: gzhan gyi lus kyi rjes su lta ba de'i tshe
T03D3808:123b-35: na nang dang phyi'i lus la lus kyi rjes su
T03D3808:123b-37: gang gi tshe nang gi sems can du bgrang ba'i gzugs la dmigs nas tshor ba dang sems dang /
T03D3808:123b-41: nang gi chos rnams la bya'o //
T03D3808:123b-42: gang gi tshe phyi rol sems can du mi bgrang
T03D3808:123b-43: ba'i gzugs la dmigs pa las 'byung ba de'i tshe
T03D3808:123b-46: phyi'i chos rnams la zhes bya'o //
T03D3808:124a-1: sems can du bgrang ba gzhan gyi gzugs la dmigs
T03D3808:124a-2: pa las byung ba de'i tshe na phyi nang gi
T03D3808:124a-3: tshor ba dang / phyi nang gi sems dang /
T03D3808:124a-4: phyi nang gi chos rnams la zhes bya'o //
T03D3808:124a-5: yang na skye mched drug la dmigs par byed pa
T03D3808:124a-6: la ni nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su
T03D3808:124a-8: dbang por ma gtogs shing ma zin pa phyi'i gzugs
T03D3808:124a-9: la dmigs par byed pa de la ni phyi'i lus
T03D3808:124a-10: la lus kyi rjes su lta ba zhes bya'o //
T03D3808:124a-11: skye mched drug ma gtogs par nang gi zin pa'i
T03D3808:124a-12: gzugs la dmigs par byed pa la ni phyi dang
T03D3808:124a-13: nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba
T03D3808:124a-14: zhes bya'o // gzugs de gsum la dmigs pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /
T03D3808:124a-16: chos rnams kyang rnam pa gsum du sbyar bar bya'o //
T03D3808:124a-17: yang na nang gi 'byung ba'i gzugs rang gi lus
T03D3808:124a-18: su gtogs pa la dmigs par byed pa la ni
T03D3808:124a-19: nang zhes bya'o // phyi'i gzhan gyi 'byung ba la dmigs par byed pa la ni phyi'i zhes bya'o //
T03D3808:124a-20: 'byung ba'i gzugs de yang rgyur byas nas 'byung ba'i dbang po dang /
T03D3808:124a-21: yul gyi gzugs gang yin pa de la dmigs par
T03D3808:124a-22: byed pa de la ni phyi nang gi zhes bya'o
T03D3808:124a-23: // 'di gsum la dmigs pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /
T03D3808:124a-25: chos rnams la yang rnam pa gsum du rig par bya'o //
T03D3808:124a-26: yang na gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa dang
T03D3808:124a-27: bcas pa'i nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su
T03D3808:124a-28: lta ba de'i tshe na nang gi lus dang /
T03D3808:124a-29: tshor ba dang sems dang chos kyi rjes su lta ba zhes bya'o //
T03D3808:124a-30: gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa med pa rnam
T03D3808:124a-31: par bsngos pa la sogs pa la rjes su lta
T03D3808:124a-32: ba de'i tshe na phyi'i lus dang /
T03D3808:124a-35: chos kyi rjes su lta ba zhes bya'o //
T03D3808:124a-36: gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa med pa'i rnam
T03D3808:124a-37: par bsngos pa la sogs pa'i gzugs 'das pa'i dus
T03D3808:124a-38: na rnam par shes pa dang /
T03D3808:124a-40: rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa'i lus 'di yang
T03D3808:124a-41: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rnam par shes pa med
T03D3808:124a-42: par mtshungs pa'i chos nyid dang mthun pa'i chos nyid
T03D3808:124a-43: du rjes su lta ba de'i tshe na phyi nang
T03D3808:124a-44: gi lus dang / tshor ba dang /
T03D3808:124a-46: chos kyi rjes su lta ba zhes bya'o //
T03D3808:124b-0: nang @124b gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta
T03D3808:124b-1: ba zhes bya ba ni nang gi lus la lus
T03D3808:124b-2: zhes brtags pa yin par rjes su brtags nas lta
T03D3808:124b-4: gang zag yod pa nyid dam /
T03D3808:124b-5: chos yod pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su
T03D3808:124b-6: ma mthong bas mi dmigs par gnas pas gnas so
T03D3808:124b-7: zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T03D3808:124b-8: mi dmigs par gnas pa de nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
T03D3808:124b-9: lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la
T03D3808:124b-10: rnam par mi rtog go zhes bya ba gsungs so
T03D3808:124b-11: // lus su 'du shes pa dang ldan pa'i rnam
T03D3808:124b-12: par rtog pa gang yin pa 'di ni lus so
T03D3808:124b-13: // zhes bya ba'am / rtag pa dang /
T03D3808:124b-26: smon pa med pa la sogs pa de dag tu
T03D3808:124b-27: rnam par mi rtog go zhes bya ba'i tha tshig
T03D3808:124b-28: go // de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis zhes bya
T03D3808:124b-29: ba ni de yang de la rjes su lta ba
T03D3808:124b-30: go // dang / rnam par mi rtog pa ni
T03D3808:124b-31: mi dmigs par yod la byed pa'i dbang gis zhes
T03D3808:124b-33: brtun pa can shes bzhin dang /
T03D3808:124b-34: dran pa dang ldan zhing 'jig rten gyi brnab sems dang /
T03D3808:124b-35: yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas zhes bya ba la /
T03D3808:124b-37: gus par sbyor bas yang dag par mngon par brtson pa'i phyir brtun pa zhes bya'o //
T03D3808:124b-38: rjes su lta ba'i shes rab dang /
T03D3808:124b-39: shes bzhin gyis yang dag par yid la byed pa'i phyir shes bzhin zhes bya'o //
T03D3808:124b-40: mi brjed pa'i bdag nyid dang /
T03D3808:124b-42: g-yeng ba med par byed pa'i dran pa dang bcas pa la dran pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o //
T03D3808:124b-45: dran pa de dag gi phan yon bstan pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi brnab sems dang /
T03D3808:124b-46: yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T03D3808:124b-47: 'jig rten gyi chos zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten
T03D3808:124b-48: gyi chos rnams la zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste
T03D3808:124b-49: / rnyed pa dang grags pa dang /
T03D3808:124b-51: bstod pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi chos bzhi la ni chags sems 'byung ngo //
T03D3808:125a-4: smad pa rnams la ni yid mi bde ba zhes 'byung ste /
T03D3808:125a-5: de ltar mi dmigs par bsgom pa la brtson pa
T03D3808:125a-6: ni 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis mi gos
T03D3808:125a-7: par bstan pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi brnab sems dang
T03D3808:125a-8: / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T03D3808:125a-10: chos rnams mi dmigs pa'i phyir sems can rnams dang /
T03D3808:125a-11: 'du byed rnams la rjes su chags pa dang /
T03D3808:125a-12: khong khro ba spangs par bstan pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi brnab sems dang /
T03D3808:125a-13: yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T03D3808:125a-14: yang na sgrib pa thams cad kyi nang na gtso bor gyur pa 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang /
T03D3808:125a-15: gnod sems gnyis spangs par bstan pa'i sgrib pa thams cad kyang spangs par bstan pa yin no //
T03D3808:125a-16: de bzhin du nang gi tshor ba rnams la tshor
T03D3808:125a-17: ba'i rjes su lta zhing zhes bya ba ni bde
T03D3808:125a-18: ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang /
T03D3808:125a-19: btang snyoms kyi dbang gis tshor ba rnam pa gsum du gyur pa las lus kyi tshor ba dang /
T03D3808:125a-20: sems kyi tshor ba'i dbang gis drug tu gyur pa dang /
T03D3808:125a-21: zang zing dang bcas pa dang /
T03D3808:125a-23: zhen pa la brten pa dang /
T03D3808:125a-24: mngon par 'byung ba la brten pa rnams zhes bya
T03D3808:125a-25: bar tha dad du phye ba'i tshor ba rnams la
T03D3808:125a-26: tshor bar brtags pa bzung nas /
T03D3808:125a-28: chos yin par brten pa la bltas nas mi dmigs par gnas pas gnas so//
T03D3808:125a-29: de bzhin du sems la yang 'dod chags dang bcas pa dang /
T03D3808:125a-31: zhe sdang dang bcas pa dang /
T03D3808:125a-33: gti mug dang bcas pa dang /
T03D3808:125a-36: rnam par 'phros pa zhes bya ba la sogs par
T03D3808:125a-37: dbye bas phye ba'i sems la brten nas bdag gam
T03D3808:125a-38: chos mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rjes su lta zhing
T03D3808:125a-39: gnas so // chos rnams la yang phung po dang khams dang /
T03D3808:125a-42: byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
T03D3808:125a-43: 'phags pa'i bden pa la sogs pa'i chos rnams la
T03D3808:125b-0: @125b brten nas kun brtags pa'i chos thams cad mi
T03D3808:125b-1: dmigs par snyoms par 'jug pa la bsgom zhing gnas
T03D3808:125b-2: so zhes bya bar sbyar bar bya'o //
T03D3808:125b-3: de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa'i tshul du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bstan nas /
T03D3808:125b-4: nyan thos kyi tshul du bstan pa'i tshul gyis lus
T03D3808:125b-5: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid rnam pa drug
T03D3808:125b-7: de'i nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na /
T03D3808:125b-8: spyod na spyod do zhes bya bar rab tu shes so zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3808:125b-11: dbugs rdub pa dang 'byung ba'i sgo dang /
T03D3808:125b-12: khams rnams rnam par gzhag pa'i sgo dang /
T03D3808:125b-13: rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi sgo dang /
T03D3808:125b-15: sgo drug po dag gis bstan to //
T03D3808:125b-16: de la dang por spyod lam gyi sgo nas bstan pa ni spyod pa dang /
T03D3808:125b-17: 'greng ba dang 'dug pa dang nyal ba zhes bya'o //
T03D3808:125b-18: spyod lam 'di dag la rnam pa gsum bstan te /
T03D3808:125b-19: chen po dang 'bring dang chung ngu'o //
T03D3808:125b-20: gang gi tshe lam ring por 'gro ba de'i tshe spyod lam bzhi ni che ba zhes bya ste /
T03D3808:125b-21: de'i dbang gis 'gres dang po bstan to //
T03D3808:125b-22: gang gi tshe bsod snyoms kyi phyir grong du 'jug pa'am /
T03D3808:125b-23: gtsug lag khang nas gtsug lag khang gzhan dag tu
T03D3808:125b-24: don gnyer du 'gro ba de'i tshe spyod pa'i spyod
T03D3808:125b-26: de'i dbang gis de'i dbang du 'gro'am /
T03D3808:125b-27: 'ong yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin zhes bya bas ni gnyis pa bstan to //
T03D3808:125b-28: lus kyi nyam nga ba bsal ba'i phyir bshang gci
T03D3808:125b-29: la sogs pa'i gnas su 'gro ba la sogs par
T03D3808:125b-30: spyod pa'i spyod lam bzhi ni chung ngu ste /
T03D3808:125b-34: nyal ba zhes bya bas bstan to //
T03D3808:125b-36: rnam par lta yang shes bzhin spyod pa yin zhes bya ba la sogs pas chung du nyid do //
T03D3808:125b-37: de la bya ba byed pa thams cad la yang so sor rtog pa rnam pa lnga ste /
T03D3808:125b-38: 'di dang 'di bya'o zhes bya ba dang /
T03D3808:125b-39: 'di ni bya'o 'di ni mi bya'o zhes bya ba dang /
T03D3808:125b-40: 'di ni dus yin no 'di ni dus ma yin no zhes bya ba dang /
T03D3808:126a-1: 'di ltar mi bya'o zhes bya ba de'i don du bya'o zhes bya ba ste /
T03D3808:126a-2: de yang spyod na spyod do zhes bya bar rab
T03D3808:126a-3: tu shes so zhes bya ba la sogs pas bshad
T03D3808:126a-4: do // de'i 'og tu spyod lam chung ngu'i 'gres
T03D3808:126a-5: la 'gro zhes bya ba ni phar la 'gro ba'o
T03D3808:126a-6: do // // 'ong zhes bya ba ni slar log pa'o //
T03D3808:126a-7: blo sngon du ma btang bas ma brtags par gzugs la lta ba ni kun tu lta ba'o //
T03D3808:126a-8: blo sngon du btang bas bsgrims te gzugs la lta ba ni rnam par lta ba'o //
T03D3808:126a-9: yang na mdun du lta ba ni kun tu lta ba'o //
T03D3808:126a-10: phyogs gzhan du lta ba ni rnam par lta ba'o //
T03D3808:126a-15: nying lag rnams bya ba de dang de dag la bsdus pa ni bskum pa'o //
T03D3808:126a-17: chos gos chen po ni snam sbyar ro //
T03D3808:126a-18: de las gzhan pa'i gos ni chos gos so //
T03D3808:126a-19: bslang ba'i snod ni lhung bzed do //
T03D3808:126a-20: zos pa ni 'bras chan la sogs pa'o //
T03D3808:126a-21: 'thungs pa ni btung ba la sogs pa'o //
T03D3808:126a-22: 'chos pa ni khur ba la sogs pa'o //
T03D3808:126a-24: zho dang bu ram la sogs pa'o //
T03D3808:126a-25: lam du 'gro ba la sogs pa'am /
T03D3808:126a-26: tsha bas gdungs pa la sogs pas dus ma yin
T03D3808:126a-27: pa'i gnyid kyis non pa la phyogs su lta ba
T03D3808:126a-29: gdong phyi ba la sogs pa ni gtsang ba'o //
T03D3808:126a-30: bcag pa la sogs pa ni 'gro ba'o //
T03D3808:126a-31: bla ma la bsnyen bkur bya ba la sogs pa ni 'greng ba'o //
T03D3808:126a-32: skyil mo krung la sogs pa ni 'dug pa'o //
T03D3808:126a-33: dus su seng ge'i nyal thabs su nyal ba ni nyal ba'o //
T03D3808:126a-34: mel tse thun lnga ni gnyid kyis ma log pa'o //
T03D3808:126a-35: chos 'chad pa'i yang dag pa'i gtam la sogs pa ni smra ba'o //
T03D3808:126a-36: ji ltar thos shing bzung ba'i chos rnams kyi don
T03D3808:126a-37: sems shing 'jal ba la sogs pa ni mi smra
T03D3808:126a-38: ba'o // lhag mthong dang zhi gnas la mngon par
T03D3808:126a-39: brtson pa ni nang du yang dag par 'jog ces
T03D3808:126a-40: ba'o // bya'o // dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba'i
T03D3808:126a-41: sgo gsum la dran bzhin du dbugs rngubs na dran
T03D3808:126a-42: bzhin du dbugs rngubs na dran bzhin du dbugs rubs
T03D3808:126a-43: so snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
T03D3808:126a-44: du rab tu shes so zhes bya ba ni dran
T03D3808:126b-0: ba'o // bya'o // @126b pa dang / shes bzhin gtso bor byas te /
T03D3808:126b-1: legs par nan tan du dbugs rngubs so zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T03D3808:126b-2: dbugs ring du rngubs na dbugs ring du rngubs so
T03D3808:126b-3: snyam du zhes bya ba ni gang gi tshe las
T03D3808:126b-4: dang po pa 'di dran pa dang /
T03D3808:126b-5: shes bzhin du dran pa la brtson par byed pa na de'i lus dang /
T03D3808:126b-6: sems shin tu sbyangs pa na dbugs rngub pa dang /
T03D3808:126b-7: 'byung ba dag rim gyis phra bar gyur cing rtogs par dka' bar gyur pa de'i tshe /
T03D3808:126b-8: rnal 'byor pa dag gis dbugs ring du byas nas rtogs par byed do //
T03D3808:126b-9: kha cig na re ngal gso ba'i phyir bar bar thung du byas /
T03D3808:126b-10: bar bar ring du byas te bsgom par bya'o zhes zer ro //
T03D3808:126b-11: gzhan dag na re dbugs ma thal bar rngub pa dang /
T03D3808:126b-12: 'byung ba la ni ring po zhes bya /
T03D3808:126b-13: skabs skabs su dbugs rngub pa dang /
T03D3808:126b-14: 'byung ba la ni thung ngu zhes bya'o zhes zer ro //
T03D3808:126b-15: rdza mkhan nam rdza mkhan gyi slob ma zhes bya
T03D3808:126b-16: ba la rdza mkhan zhes bya ba ni legs par
T03D3808:126b-17: lobs pa'o // rdza mkhan gyi slob ma zhes bya ba ni slob pa ste /
T03D3808:126b-18: gnyis ka smos pa ni rnal 'byor spyod pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
T03D3808:126b-19: las dang po pa gnyis dang mthun par bstan pa'o //
T03D3808:126b-21: lus kyi rjes su lta ba'i sgo ni go sla'o //
T03D3808:126b-22: mi sdug pa'i sgo la ni 'gres dgu ste /
T03D3808:126b-23: shi nas zhag gcig lon pa ni rnam par bam pa'o //
T03D3808:126b-24: shi nas zhag gnyis lon pa ni rnam par bsngos pa'o //
T03D3808:126b-25: shi nas zhag gsum lon pa'am /
T03D3808:126b-26: shi nas zhag bzhi lon pa ni rnam par rnags pa'o //
T03D3808:126b-27: shi nas zhag lnga lon pa ni rnam par 'bus
T03D3808:126b-28: gzhig pa ste 'bu zhugs zhes bya ba'i tha tshig
T03D3808:126b-29: go // 'das pa'i dus thams cad kyang de lta bu'i chos can no //
T03D3808:126b-30: ma 'ongs pa yang de lta bu'i rang bzhin can no //
T03D3808:126b-31: da ltar byung ba yang chos nyid de las ma 'das pa'o //
T03D3808:126b-32: za ba zhes bya ba'i 'gres dang /
T03D3808:126b-33: rnam par zos pa zhes bya ba'i 'gres gnyis ni rnam par zos pa'i mi sdug pa ste /
T03D3808:126b-34: da ltar dang 'das pa'i bye brag gis phye ba'o //
T03D3808:126b-35: sha dang khrag ra ri chags pa rgyus pas brang breng du 'brel pa zhes bya ba'i 'gres dang /
T03D3808:126b-36: gsum char yang med pa'i 'gres dang /
T03D3808:127a-1: gnyis ni rnam par dmar ba'i mi sdug pa'o //
T03D3808:127a-2: rus pa keng rus zungs med pa /
T03D3808:127a-3: gyes pa dung gi mdog ltar gyur pa /
T03D3808:127a-4: sa la rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i 'gres dang /
T03D3808:127a-5: rkang pa'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor /
T03D3808:127a-6: byin pa'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor zhes bya ba'i 'gres dang /
T03D3808:127a-7: 'gres de gnyis ni rnam par 'thor ba'i mi sdug pa ste /
T03D3808:127a-9: phyogs thams cad du 'thor ba zhes bya ba de tsam gyis dbye'o //
T03D3808:127a-10: 'gres 'og ma gnyis kyis rus gong gis mi sdug pa ste /
T03D3808:127a-12: rus pa ma grugs pa dang /
T03D3808:127a-13: kha dog gyur la rus pa grugs pa zhes bya ba de tsam gyis dbye'o //
T03D3808:127a-14: de ltar rnam par bam pa dang /
T03D3808:127a-21: rus gong zhes bya ba mi sdug pa rnam pa brgyad yin no //
T03D3808:127a-22: rnam par 'bus gzhig pa zhes bya ba ni rnam
T03D3808:127a-23: par 'tshig pa zhes bya ba yang de nyid do
T03D3808:127a-24: // de la thams cad kyi dang po ni mi dmigs par yid la byed pa'o //
T03D3808:127a-25: rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa'i lus kyi rjes su lta ba lnga dang /
T03D3808:127a-26: rnam par shes pa med pa'i mi sdug pa brgyad dang /
T03D3808:127a-27: rnam pa bcu gsum gyis lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bshad de /
T03D3808:127a-31: gnyis pa la yang dag par spong ba bzhi zhes
T03D3808:127a-32: bya ba ni 'dis sems yang dag par 'jog pas
T03D3808:127a-33: na yang dag par 'jog pa zhes bya ste brtson
T03D3808:127a-34: 'grus so // brtson 'grus de yang sbyor ba'i bye
T03D3808:127a-35: brag gis rnam pa bzhir gyur pas na bzhi zhes
T03D3808:127a-36: 'grus so // bya'o // 'dun pa bskyed do rtsol
T03D3808:127a-37: lo brtson 'grus rtsom mo sems rab tu 'dzin to
T03D3808:127a-38: yang dag par rab tu 'jog go zhes bya ba
T03D3808:127a-39: 'grus so // bya'o // ni / brtson 'grus de yang rnam pa bzhir 'gyur te /
T03D3808:127a-44: dang por 'di ltar bya'o zhes go cha bgo bar byed do //
T03D3808:127b-0: de ni 'dun @127b pa bskyed do zhes gsungs pa'o //
T03D3808:127b-1: de'i 'og tu go cha bgos pa dang rjes su mthun par sbyor ba rtsom ste /
T03D3808:127b-2: de ni rtsol lo zhes gsungs pa'o //
T03D3808:127b-3: de'i 'og tu tshigs che bar gyur kyang skyo ba
T03D3808:127b-4: ma skyes par brtson 'grus nyid 'phel bar byed de
T03D3808:127b-5: / de ni brtson 'grus rtsom mo zhes gsungs pa'o //
T03D3808:127b-6: de'i 'og tu thabs ma yin par bsgrub pa yongs
T03D3808:127b-7: su spangs nas yang dag pa'i thabs la gnas par
T03D3808:127b-8: byed de / de ni sems rab tu 'dzin no //
T03D3808:127b-9: yang dag par rab tu 'jog go zhes bya ba 'di gnyis kyis bstan to //
T03D3808:127b-10: de la sems bying bar gyur na rab tu 'dzin
T03D3808:127b-11: pa yid la byed pas rab tu 'dzin pas na
T03D3808:127b-12: sems rab tu 'dzin pa zhes bya'o //
T03D3808:127b-13: sems rgod par gyur na mngon par sdud pa yid
T03D3808:127b-14: la byed pas yang dag par 'jog pa la yang
T03D3808:127b-15: dag par rab tu 'jog pa zhes bya'o //
T03D3808:127b-17: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi zhes bya ba ni
T03D3808:127b-18: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos zhes bya ba rdzu
T03D3808:127b-20: gnas su gyur pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa zhes bya ste /
T03D3808:127b-25: 'di ltar la la ni dge ba'i chos sgom pa
T03D3808:127b-26: la 'dod pa cher skyed par gyur pa na de
T03D3808:127b-27: 'dun pa'i stobs 'ba' zhig gis sbyor bar gyur pa
T03D3808:127b-28: / legs par nges par sems shing yid la byed
T03D3808:127b-29: pa gzhan med pas sems rtse gcig tu 'gyur te
T03D3808:127b-30: / / de'i 'dun pa'i dbang gis byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin la 'dun pa'i ting 'dzin zhes bya'o //
T03D3808:127b-31: la la ni yang dag par spong ba bzhi'i brtson
T03D3808:127b-32: 'grus kyis rab tu sbyor ba na dge ba la
T03D3808:127b-33: 'jog pa'i brtson 'grus kyis rab tu sbyor zhing /
T03D3808:127b-34: mi dge ba spong ba dang /
T03D3808:127b-35: dge ba skyed pa la rab tu zhugs pa na sems rtse gcig tu gyur te /
T03D3808:127b-36: de'i brtson 'grus kyi dbang gis byung ba'i ting nge
T03D3808:127b-37: 'dzin la brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o
T03D3808:127b-38: // la la ni sems sbyong ba la zhugs pa na zhi gnas dang rab tu 'dzin pa dang /
T03D3808:127b-39: btang snyoms kyi rgyu mtshan rnams kyis sems yang dag
T03D3808:127b-40: par 'jog pa la sems sbyong ba'i stobs kyis sems
T03D3808:127b-41: rtse gcig tu gnas par gyur te /
T03D3808:128a-0: de'i sems kyi dbang gis byung @128a * //
T03D3808:128a-1: ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sems kyi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o //
T03D3808:128a-2: la la ni gang gi tshe yang dag par sbyor
T03D3808:128a-3: ba na tshul bzhin ma yin pa spang ba dang
T03D3808:128a-4: / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang /
T03D3808:128a-5: kun nas dkris pa rnams mi skye ba dang /
T03D3808:128a-6: kun nas dkris pa'i gnyen po'i chos rnams goms par
T03D3808:128a-7: byas pas sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams kun
T03D3808:128a-9: de'i tshe de 'di snyam du sems so //
T03D3808:128a-10: ci bdag sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams la
T03D3808:128a-11: kun tu mi spyod dam snyam du sems pa de'i
T03D3808:128a-12: tshe na yang de 'di snyam du sems te /
T03D3808:128a-13: ci sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams yod pa la /
T03D3808:128a-14: bdag kun tu mi spyod par gyur tam /
T03D3808:128a-15: 'on te med pa nyid la kun tu mi spyod
T03D3808:128a-16: par gyur snyam pa de bdag gis yongs su dpyad
T03D3808:128a-17: par bya'o snyam nas dpyod pa yid la byed pa
T03D3808:128a-18: bskyed de / yang dag par sems par 'gyur te /
T03D3808:128a-19: de dpyod pa yid la byed pa de'i dbang du
T03D3808:128a-20: byas nas rtsol ba na ting nge 'dzin skyes pa
T03D3808:128a-21: de dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o //
T03D3808:128a-22: de ltar ting nge 'dzin rnam pa bzhi byung zhing
T03D3808:128a-23: kun nas dkris pa thag ring du gyur nas bag
T03D3808:128a-24: la nyal ba rnams spang ba'i phyir gong du yang
T03D3808:128a-25: dag pa'i spong ba bzhi po dag gis brtson 'grus
T03D3808:128a-26: rtsom ste / de brtson 'grus rtsom pa na spong
T03D3808:128a-27: ba'i 'du byed kyi chos brgyad mngon du 'gyur te
T03D3808:128a-28: rtsom ste / / nam zhig na 'jig rten pa dang /
T03D3808:128a-29: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bskyed par bya snyam du sems pa'i 'dun pa dang /
T03D3808:128a-30: mi dge ba'i chos thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i brtson 'grus dang /
T03D3808:128a-31: gong du thob pa'i chos la dad pa dang /
T03D3808:128a-32: de sngon du btang ba'i shin tu sbyangs pa dang /
T03D3808:128a-33: de la dran pa dang shes bzhin gyi phyogs dang /
T03D3808:128a-34: lhag mthong gi phyogs kyi shes bzhin dang /
T03D3808:128a-35: de la sems mngon par 'du byed pa'i sems dang /
T03D3808:128a-36: sems kun nas nyams pa med pa'i bdag nyid kyi
T03D3808:128a-37: btang snyoms rnams te sngar smos pa'i 'dun pa'i ting
T03D3808:128b-0: btang snyoms zhes bya ba spong ba'i 'du byed @128b
T03D3808:128b-1: brgyad po 'di dag dang ldan par 'jig rten las
T03D3808:128b-2: 'das pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par 'gyur ba'i ting
T03D3808:128b-3: nge 'dzin sgom mo zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go
T03D3808:128b-4: // dpen pa la gnas pa zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa dag las dben pa'o //
T03D3808:128b-5: srid pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba'o //
T03D3808:128b-7: phung po thams cad rnam par spong ba'o //
T03D3808:128b-8: yang na sdug bsngal gyi bden pa yongs su shes pa'i phyir dben pa la gnas pa'o //
T03D3808:128b-9: kun 'byung ba'i bden pa spang ba'i phyir /
T03D3808:128b-10: 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa'o //
T03D3808:128b-11: 'gog pa'i bden pa mngon sum du byas pa'i phyir /
T03D3808:128b-13: lam gyi bden pa bsgom pa'i phyir /
T03D3808:128b-14: rnam par spong bas yongs su bsgyur ba zhes sbyar bar bya'o //
T03D3808:128b-15: yang na tshul khrims kyi phung pos ni dben pa la gnas pa'o //
T03D3808:128b-16: ting nge 'dzin gyi phung pos ni 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa'o //
T03D3808:128b-17: shes rab kyi phung pos 'gog pa la gnas pa'o //
T03D3808:128b-18: rnam par grol ba'i phung pos ni rnam par spong bas yongs su bsgyur ba'o //
T03D3808:128b-19: bzhi pa la ni de ltar bdag po bzhi po
T03D3808:128b-20: dag gis yang dag par sbyor ba khyad par gyi
T03D3808:128b-21: chos 'byung ba'i rtags mthong bas gong du khyad par
T03D3808:128b-22: gyi chos 'byung ba la nges pa skye ste /
T03D3808:128b-23: de'i tshe rnal 'byor pa de ston pa dang /
T03D3808:128b-24: nyan thos rnams kyi thob pa la yid ches pa skye'o //
T03D3808:128b-25: de de ltar yid ches pa na gong du 'jig
T03D3808:128b-26: rten las 'das pa'i chos 'byung ba la dbang byed
T03D3808:128b-27: pas dad pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o //
T03D3808:128b-28: dad pa'i stobs kyis kyang brtson 'grus shin tu lhag par skye ste /
T03D3808:128b-29: de yang de bzhin du 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
T03D3808:128b-30: chos 'byung ba la dbang byed pas brtson 'grus kyi
T03D3808:128b-32: dran pa la sogs pa la yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
T03D3808:128b-33: lnga pa la ni de ltar dad pa de nyid mngon par 'phel bas lha'am bdud dam /
T03D3808:128b-35: gang gis kyang chos dang mthun pas thub par ma
T03D3808:128b-36: nus shing nyon mongs pa kun nas dkris pas kyang
T03D3808:128b-37: mi tshugs par gyur pa de'i tshe de nyid la
T03D3808:129a-0: gong du smos pa de dag nyid kyis mi brdzi ba'i phyir de bzhin du brtson 'grus @129a * //
T03D3808:129a-1: la sogs pa yang thub dka' bar 'gyur ro //
T03D3808:129a-2: stobs de dag gis rnal 'byor pa de stobs dang
T03D3808:129a-3: ldan pas bdud kyi stobs thams cad las rgyal nas

T03D3808:174b-17: mi rtag par yid la byed do //
T03D3808:174b-18: bdag nyid sdug bsngal gsum dang ldan pa dang /
T03D3808:174b-19: gzhan dag gi sdug bsngal gyi rgyur 'gyur ba'i phyir /
T03D3808:174b-21: dbang sgyur ba med pa la sogs pas bdag rang
T03D3808:174b-22: la bdag gi mtshan nyid dang mi ldan pa'i phyir
T03D3808:174b-23: bdag med pa'o // chu shing gi sdong bo ltar
T03D3808:174b-24: nang gi snying po med pas nang bdag gis stong
T03D3808:174b-26: rkyen du pas gso dgos pa dang /
T03D3808:174b-27: lus dang yid kyi sdug bsngal gyi rtsa ba yin pa'i phyir nad dang 'dra bas nad do //
T03D3808:174b-28: zhen pa'i gnod pa dang ldan pa dang nyon mongs
T03D3808:174b-29: pa'i mi gtsang ba zag pa dang skye ba dang
T03D3808:174b-31: 'jig pas rim bzhin du skrangs pa dang smin pa dang /
T03D3808:174b-32: rdol ba'i phyir 'bras dang 'dra bas na 'bras so //
T03D3808:174b-33: phyi nang gi gnod pas zug par byed cing bcos
T03D3808:174b-34: dka' bas zug rdu dang 'dra ba'i phyir zug rngu'o
T03D3808:174b-35: // smad par bya ba yin pa dang /
T03D3808:174b-36: gnod par 'gyur ba'i phyir sdig to dang 'dra bas na sdig pa'o //
T03D3808:174b-37: rkyen gyi khar las pa dang /
T03D3808:174b-38: las bdag gir bya ba yin pas /
T03D3808:174b-39: gzhan las dbang bsgyur ba med pa'i phyir gzhan la rag las pa'o //
T03D3808:174b-41: 'chi ba rnams kyis rab tu 'jig pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir /
T03D3808:174b-43: 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid gsum dang ldan zhing 'jig
T03D3808:174b-44: rten gyi chos mi brtan pa brgyad dang ldan pa'i
T03D3808:175a-2: gnod pas kyang 'jig par 'gyur ba'i ngang tshul can yin pa'i phyir /
T03D3808:175a-4: mi 'jigs pa zhes bya ba nye bar zhi ba bde ba'i gnyen po yin pa dang /
T03D3808:175a-5: 'jigs pa thams cad kyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir 'jigs pa'o //
T03D3808:175a-6: ma tshor bzhin du gnod pa sna tshogs kyis 'tshe ba'o //
T03D3808:175a-7: gnod pa rnam pa mang po dang /
T03D3808:175a-12: zhi bar yid la bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa la //
T03D3808:175a-13: ngag gi mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i phyir bdag med pa'o //
T03D3808:175a-14: sdug bsngal thams cad nye bar zhi ba'i phyir zhi ba'o //
T03D3808:175a-15: nyon mongs pa dang mi ldan pa'i phyir dben pa'o //
T03D3808:175a-16: bdag dang bdag gi bas stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir stong pa nyid do //
T03D3808:175a-17: 'dus byas kyi mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir mtshan ma med pa'o //
T03D3808:175a-18: khams gsum du mi smon pas smon pa med pa'o //
T03D3808:175a-19: phyis las mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i phyir /
T03D3808:175a-20: mngon par 'du byed pa med pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T03D3808:175a-21: chos dang chos rnams sbyor ba byed ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T03D3808:175a-23: dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sems dang /
T03D3808:175a-24: yongs su bsngo ba'i sems rnams phan tshun du 'grogs par yid la byed pa ni sbyor ba'o //
T03D3808:175a-25: gsum char yang bdag gi ngo bo dang /
T03D3808:175a-26: gzhan gyi ngo bo la yod pa ma yin par yid la byed pa ni dpyod par byed pa'o //
T03D3808:175a-27: gsum char yang sems ma yin pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o //
T03D3808:175a-28: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir sems ma yin pa'o
T03D3808:175a-29: zhes yid la byed pa bshad zin pa'i don yongs
T03D3808:175a-30: su rdzogs pa'o // de ltar chos thams cad la
T03D3808:175a-31: yang so sor rtog la chos gang la yang mngon
T03D3808:175a-32: par zhen pa med pa zhes bya ba ni thams
T03D3808:175a-34: 'di ni bdag med par so sor brtags pa bzhi pa'o //
T03D3808:175a-35: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i
T03D3808:175a-36: rtsa ba'i sems gang yin pa de byang chub kyi
T03D3808:175a-37: sems dang 'grogs pa ma yin zhes bya ba la
T03D3808:175a-38: sogs pas ci bstan zhe na /
T03D3808:175a-39: byang chub sems dpa' ni sngar kun rdzob kyi yid
T03D3808:175a-40: la byed pas dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di bla na
T03D3808:175b-0: med @175b pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
T03D3808:175b-1: tu yongs su bsngo'o zhes spyir yongs su bsngo bar
T03D3808:175b-2: byas nas / don dam pa'i tshul du so sor brtags nas dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sems dang /
T03D3808:175b-3: byang chub kyi sems dang yongs su bsngo ba'i sems rnams phan tshun du 'grogs pa med de /
T03D3808:175b-4: de ltar 'grogs pa med pas yongs su bsngo ba yod dam med ces so sor rtog go //
T03D3808:175b-5: 'dir dga' zhig gal te sems rnam par 'grogs pa
T03D3808:175b-6: med kyang 'on kyang sems snga ma'i dbang gis bskyed
T03D3808:175b-7: pa'i 'du byed kyi bye brag ni sems phyi ma
T03D3808:175b-8: dang lhan cig tu 'grogs par 'gyur te /
T03D3808:175b-9: thams cad kyi tha ma'i sems la ni 'du byed thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
T03D3808:175b-10: de bas na sgo 'dis sems rnam par 'grogs pa yod do zhes zer te /
T03D3808:175b-11: de bas na de bstsal ba'i phyir /
T03D3808:175b-12: dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sems gang yin pa de ni
T03D3808:175b-13: byang chub kyi sems la med ces bya ba la
T03D3808:175b-15: bag chags kyi 'du byed la sogs pa'i sgo nas
T03D3808:175b-16: sems de la sems gzhan med do zhes bya ba'i
T03D3808:175b-17: tha tshig ste / 'di ltar sems nyid med par
T03D3808:175b-18: bstan pas bag chags kyi 'du byed la sogs pa
T03D3808:175b-19: ni ri bong gi rva rno ba dang rtul ba'i
T03D3808:175b-20: dngos po lta bur mi snang ngo zhes bya ba'i
T03D3808:175b-21: phyir de skad du bshad do //
T03D3808:175b-22: de ltar gzhan gyi ngo bo la med par dpyad nas yang bdag gi ngo bo la dpyod do //
T03D3808:175b-23: dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sems gang yin pa de dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sems la med /
T03D3808:175b-24: byang chub kyi sems gang yin pa de yang byang
T03D3808:175b-25: chub kyi sems la med ces bya ba la sogs
T03D3808:175b-26: pa ste / de bzhin nyid tsam du mthong ba
T03D3808:175b-27: la ni de lta bu'i kun tu dpyod pa med
T03D3808:175b-28: pa ste / pa'i phyir ro // koo shi ka
T03D3808:175b-29: dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sems gang yin pa de ni
T03D3808:175b-30: sems ma yin zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni
T03D3808:175b-31: de bzhin nyid tsam kho nar ston to //
T03D3808:175b-32: sems ni rang gi chos nyid kyi dbang gis sems
T03D3808:175b-33: kun brtags pa dang bral ba'i phyir sems med pa'i
T03D3808:175b-34: ngo bo nyid de chos nyid kyi sems su grag
T03D3808:175b-35: go // sems med pa ni sems med pa dang
T03D3808:175b-36: 'grogs par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T03D3808:175b-37: ni chos nyid kyi sems su grag pa las 'grogs
T03D3808:175b-38: pa'am yod pa'am yongs su bsngo ba thams cad kyi
T03D3808:175b-39: thams cad du ma grag go zhes ston to //
T03D3808:176a-1: ni de so so rang gis rig pa yin pas bsam pa'i lam las 'das pa'i phyir /
T03D3808:176a-2: bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
T03D3808:176a-4: koo shi ka 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
T03D3808:176a-5: dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3808:176a-6: pa'o zhes bya ba ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i
T03D3808:176a-7: pha rol tu phyin pa'i shes rab ces bya ba'i
T03D3808:176a-8: tha tshig go // gang de ltar chos thams cad
T03D3808:176a-9: la so sor rtog pa zhes bya ba ni kun
T03D3808:176a-10: tha tshig go // rdzob tu'o // chos gang la
T03D3808:176a-11: yang mngon par zhen pa med cing mi dmigs zhes
T03D3808:176a-12: bya ba ni don dam par ro //
T03D3808:176a-13: bdag gis byas pa gzo bar bgyi ste /
T03D3808:176a-14: byas pa mi gzo bar mi bgyi'o zhes bya bas ci bstan zhe na /
T03D3808:176a-15: sngon bdag gi bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpar
T03D3808:176a-16: gyur pa'i tshe sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
T03D3808:176a-17: kyi 'khor na nyan thos chen po rnams kyis gdams
T03D3808:176a-18: pa dang rjes su bstan pas yang dag par bstan
T03D3808:176a-19: pa dang / yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa

T03D3808:176a-21: pa dang / / de dag gis bstan pa'i rim
T03D3808:176a-22: pas bsgrubs nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so
T03D3808:176a-23: pa dang / / // de bas na bdag gis
T03D3808:176a-24: kyang 'khor 'dir byang chub sems dpa' 'di rnams la
T03D3808:176a-25: gdams pa dang rjes su bstan pas yang dag pa'i
T03D3808:176a-26: sgrub pa la dgod par bgyi'o //
T03D3808:176a-27: sngon gyi des bdag cag gis bstan pa'i rim pas
T03D3808:176a-28: bsgrubs na mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur
T03D3808:176a-29: te / de bas na sngon gyi nyan thos rnams
T03D3808:176a-30: kyis byas pa bdag gis shes par bya'o zhes ston
T03D3808:176a-31: te / to // gdams shing rjes su bstan pa
T03D3808:176a-32: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig rnams la bye
T03D3808:176a-33: brag ci yod ce na 'di la thog ma dang
T03D3808:176a-34: bar ma dang tha ma'i gnas skabs gsum ste //
T03D3808:176a-35: thog mar ni gdams shing rjes su bstan par bya'o //
T03D3808:176a-38: de la thog ma'i gnas skabs su 'di dag ma
T03D3808:176a-39: byed cig ces bya ba ma yin pa las bzlog
T03D3808:176a-41: 'di dag byos shig ces bya ba la sbyor ba ni rjes su bstan pa'o //
T03D3808:176a-42: bar du ni mi sgrub pa dang /
T03D3808:176a-45: yang dag par sgrub pa ste gnas skabs bzhi'o //
T03D3808:176a-46: de la mi shes pas mi sgrub pa la sgrub
T03D3808:176b-0: tu 'jug @176b pa ni yang dag par bstan pa'o
T03D3808:176b-1: // log par shes pas log par zhugs pa dag
T03D3808:176b-2: yang dag par sgrub la sbyor ba ni yang dag
T03D3808:176b-4: le lo la sogs pa'i skyon gyis cung zad sgrub
T03D3808:176b-5: pa dag legs par brtson 'grus rtsom du 'jug pa
T03D3808:176b-6: ni yang dag par gzengs stod pa'o //
T03D3808:176b-7: shes rab kyis yang dag par zhugs pa dag legs
T03D3808:176b-8: so zhes rjes su yi rangs nas de nyid la
T03D3808:176b-9: sbyor ba ni yang dag par rab tu dgyes par
T03D3808:176b-10: bgyid pa'o // tha mar ni lam la bcug cing
T03D3808:176b-11: 'bras bu la gzhag ces bya bar sbyar bar bya'o
T03D3808:176b-12: bgyid pa'o // // de'i 'og tu ji ltar gnas
T03D3808:176b-13: par bya zhes dris pa la gnas par mi bya
T03D3808:176b-14: ba yongs su spangs te gnas par bya bas gnas
T03D3808:176b-15: pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3808:176b-16: la gnas pa zhes bya bar ston to //
T03D3808:176b-17: gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ngo zhes bya ba la
T03D3808:176b-18: sogs pas stong pa nyid rtogs pa ni gnas pa'o
T03D3808:176b-19: // dmigs pa'i tshul ni gnas pa ma yin no zhes ston te /
T03D3808:176b-20: des ni 'di skad du gang gi phyir gzugs la
T03D3808:176b-21: sogs pa kun brtags pa'i chos 'di dag gzugs la
T03D3808:176b-22: sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis yod pa ma yin
T03D3808:176b-23: la / byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid kyis med pa ste /
T03D3808:176b-24: de dag gi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de tha mi dad de gcig go //
T03D3808:176b-25: de bas na chos nyid kyi gzugs la sogs pa
T03D3808:176b-26: ni yongs su grub pa yin la byang chub sems
T03D3808:176b-27: dpa' yang gnyis su med pa ste /
T03D3808:176b-28: gcig pa'i chos nyid du gnas pa ni shes rab
T03D3808:176b-29: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'o zhes
T03D3808:176b-30: bstan to // gnas par mi bya ba'i 'gres la yang rnam pa gsum du bstan te /
T03D3808:176b-31: chos la gnas par mi bya zhes bya ba ni gcig pa'o //
T03D3808:176b-32: chos nyid la gnas par mi bya zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa'o //
T03D3808:176b-33: gang zag rnams la gnas par mi bya zhes bya ba ni gsum pa'o //
T03D3808:176b-34: de la chos kyi 'gres la yang rnam pa gnyis su bstan te /
T03D3808:176b-36: chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa'o //
T03D3808:176b-37: de la gzugs la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o zhes bya ba nas /
T03D3808:176b-38: sangs rgyas nyid la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par
T03D3808:176b-39: mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du ni chos bstan
T03D3808:177a-1: koo shi ka de ltar na gzugs zhes bya bar
T03D3808:177a-2: gnas par mi bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T03D3808:177a-3: nas / de ltar na sangs rgyas nyid ces bya
T03D3808:177a-4: bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o zhes
T03D3808:177a-5: bya ba'i bar ni chos nyid kyi mtshan nyid bstan
T03D3808:177a-6: nas / pa'o // chos nyid kyi 'gres la yang rnam pa gsum du bstan te /
T03D3808:177a-7: thams cad shes pa nyid kyi phyogs kyi chos nyid bstan pa dang /
T03D3808:177a-8: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi phyogs kyi chos nyid bstan pa dang /
T03D3808:177a-9: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyogs kyi chos nyid bstan pa'o //
T03D3808:177a-10: gzugs rtag go zhes gnas par mi bya /
T03D3808:177a-11: mi rtag go zhes kyang gnas par mi bya'o zhes
T03D3808:177a-12: bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
T03D3808:177a-13: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni sbyin gnas
T03D3808:177a-14: so zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par
T03D3808:177a-15: mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du ni thams cad
T03D3808:177a-16: shes pa nyid kyi phyogs kyi chos nyid bstan pa'o
T03D3808:177a-17: // sa dang po nas sa bcu pa'i bar la gnas par mi bya'o zhes bya ba nas /
T03D3808:177a-18: sems can tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa
T03D3808:177a-19: dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
T03D3808:177a-20: byang chub la rab tu dgod par bya'o zhes bya
T03D3808:177a-21: bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o zhes
T03D3808:177a-22: bya ba'i bar du ni lam gyi rnam pa shes
T03D3808:177a-23: pa nyid kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos nyid bstan
T03D3808:177a-24: pa'o // mig lnga bsgrub par bya ste zhes bya ba nas bzung ste /
T03D3808:177a-25: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu lus la bsgrub par
T03D3808:177a-26: bya'o zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o zhes bya
T03D3808:177a-27: ba'i bar du ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
T03D3808:177a-28: nyid kyi phyogs kyi chos nyid bstan pa'o //
T03D3808:177a-29: gang zag bstan pa'i 'gres la yang thams cad shes
T03D3808:177a-30: pa nyid kyi phyogs la sogs pa'i dbang gis rnam
T03D3808:177a-31: pa gsum du sbyar bar bya ste /
T03D3808:177a-32: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas te /
T03D3808:177a-33: ting nge 'dzin gang la snyoms par zhugs pas zhes
T03D3808:177a-34: bya ba la sogs pa yang rnam pa thams cad
T03D3808:177a-35: mkhyen pa nyid kyi sa'i phyogs kyi chos so //
T03D3808:177a-36: 'o na ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
T03D3808:177a-37: chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3808:177a-38: la gnas par bya snyam zhes bya ba gnas brtan
T03D3808:177a-39: rab 'byor ci las sems par gyur ce na /
T03D3808:177b-0: @177b chos thams cad la gnas par mi bya'o zhes
T03D3808:177b-1: bshad cing stong pa nyid la ni gnas par mi
T03D3808:177b-2: nus la gnas par mi bya'o zhes kyang bshad na
T03D3808:177b-3: de ji ltar rigs par 'gyur snyam du sems par
T03D3808:177b-4: gyur to // de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis mi gnas par sgrub pa nyid /
T03D3808:177b-5: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin par bstan pa /
T03D3808:177b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs ni ci la 'ang gnas
T03D3808:177b-7: pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ste mi gnas
T03D3808:177b-8: pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bzhugs par bstan
T03D3808:177b-9: to // de ltar mi gnas pa la gnas pa'i
T03D3808:177b-10: bsgrub pa bshad pas gdul ba las brtsams te bshad
T03D3808:177b-11: pa la brjod du med par bshad pas 'dul ba
T03D3808:177b-12: gang yin pa de dag the tshom zos par gyur
T03D3808:177b-13: to // te / de bas na de dag la brtsams nas bshad pa gzhan skabs phya ste /
T03D3808:177b-14: lha'i bu dag gang smras pa shes par mi rung
T03D3808:177b-15: ngam zhes bya ba la sogs pas gang brjod pa
T03D3808:177b-16: de dag ci'i phyir mi shes sam zhes lha'i bu
T03D3808:177b-19: 'phags pa rab 'byor shes par mi rung ngo zhes smras te /
T03D3808:177b-20: de nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3808:177b-21: brjod du med pa yin pa'i phyir gnas brtan gyis
T03D3808:177b-22: yi ge gcig kyang ma brjod de zhes bya ba
T03D3808:177b-23: gsungs te / 'di ltar de na bshad par snang ba dang /
T03D3808:177b-24: mnyan par snang ba de ni kun brtags pa yin no zhes sprul pa dang /
T03D3808:177b-27: sgyu ma lta bur bstan pas lha'i bu de rnams dga' bar byas so //
T03D3808:177b-28: sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'o //
T03D3808:177b-29: lha'i bu dag gzugs ni zab pa ma yin phra
T03D3808:177b-30: ba ma yin zhes bya ba ni kun brtags pa'i
T03D3808:177b-31: gzugs yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyir zab pa
T03D3808:177b-32: ma yin phra ba ma yin no /
T03D3808:177b-33: yang lha'i bu dag 'di ltar gzugs kyi rang bzhin
T03D3808:177b-34: ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin zhes
T03D3808:177b-35: bya ba la sogs pas chos nyid kyi gzugs ni
T03D3808:177b-36: ngo bo nyid kyis mi g-yo ba'i phyir zab pa
T03D3808:177b-37: ma yin / phra ba ma yin no zhes bstan to //
T03D3808:177b-38: de bas na 'dir ni 'gres rnam pa gnyis te /
T03D3808:177b-39: chos kyi 'gres dang rang bzhin gyi 'gres so //
T03D3808:177b-40: 'o na chos bstan pa 'di la gzugs su brtags
T03D3808:177b-41: pa yang med dam zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T03D3808:178a-0: ni @178a * // gal te chos thams cad brjod

T03D3808:189a-39: rjes su yi rang ba dang /

T03D3808:195b-27: zhes bya ba'i bar du ni gang zag la bdag

T03D3808:196a-7: skabs phye'o // de nas yang mos par dka' ba

T03D3808:218a-39: gzugs la sogs pa chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid dang /
T03D3808:218b-0: @218b rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gcig go //
T03D3808:218b-1: de bas na de bzhin nyid gcig pa'i phyir gzugs
T03D3808:218b-2: la sogs pa'i chos rnams la brtag pa med do
T03D3808:218b-3: zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T03D3808:218b-4: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni sus kyang ma byas /
T03D3808:218b-7: gang du yang ma song zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'di ston te /
T03D3808:218b-8: gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bya ba dang 'gyur ba'i chos sam /
T03D3808:218b-12: grangs la sogs pa dang ldan na ni /
T03D3808:218b-13: kun brtags pa'i rnam par 'gyur te /
T03D3808:218b-14: 'o na ni gzugs la sogs pa'i chos rnams su
T03D3808:218b-15: mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyur ba zhig
T03D3808:218b-16: na gang gi phyir de'i rnam pa dang bral te
T03D3808:218b-17: / nam mkha'i chos can yin pa de'i phyir de
T03D3808:218b-18: gzugs la sogs par mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
T03D3808:218b-19: / bar mi nus so// lha rnams kyis chos zab mo de lta bu thos nas /
T03D3808:218b-20: bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3808:218b-21: pa zab po zhes bya ba la sogs pas mngon
T03D3808:218b-22: par bsngags nas de bzhin nyid de nyid don tha
T03D3808:218b-23: dad pa med par smras so //
T03D3808:218b-24: gang la gnyis kun du rgyu ba med pa de
T03D3808:218b-25: ni chos rnams kyi zab pa nyid do zhes bya
T03D3808:218b-26: ba ni chos thams cad de bzhin nyid kyi bdag

T03D3808:218b-28: gnyis su rgyu bar mi 'gyur ro //
T03D3808:218b-29: nam mkha' zab pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sngar bstan pa nyid do //
T03D3808:218b-30: chos 'di ni gzugs gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags /
T03D3808:218b-31: mi gzung ba'i slad du yang ma lags zhes bya ba ni /
T03D3808:218b-32: 'di gzugs so zhes mtshan mar 'dzin pa ni gzung pa'o //
T03D3808:218b-33: gzugs med do zhes rnam pa thams cad du skur pa 'debs pa ni mi gzung ba'o //
T03D3808:218b-34: gzugs la thogs pa ma mchis so zhes bya ba
T03D3808:218b-35: la sogs pas chos thams cad dang rjes su mthun
T03D3808:218b-36: pa nyid rnam par byed de gzugs la sogs pa'i
T03D3808:218b-37: chos thams cad la sgro 'dogs pa dang skur pa
T03D3808:218b-38: 'debs pa'i mtha' med pa'i phyir thogs pa med pa
T03D3808:218b-39: 'di ltar kun brtags pa'i gzugs ni yod pa ma
T03D3808:219a-2: chos nyid kyi gzugs ni yod pa'i phyir skur pa 'debs pa med de /
T03D3808:219a-3: de bas na gzugs dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
T03D3808:219a-4: de bzhin du thams cad la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
T03D3808:219a-5: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni ma 'ongs ma song ba ste /

T03D3808:219a-7: ma 'ongs ma song zhes bya ba la sogs pas

T03D3808:219a-10: rjes su skyes pa yin par bsgrub pa'i phyir ma 'ongs ma song zhes bya smos te /

T03D3808:219a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
T03D3808:219a-14: de nyid chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang
T03D3808:219a-15: de'o // chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang
T03D3808:219a-16: yin pa de ni rab 'byor de bzhin nyid kyang
T03D3808:219a-17: de'o zhes bya ba ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'i
T03D3808:219a-18: phyir gcig go zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T03D3808:219a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gnas pa zhes
T03D3808:219a-20: bya ba ni chos gnas pa'i mtshan nyid du yang
T03D3808:219a-22: 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med ces bya ba la /
T03D3808:219a-23: 'gyur ba med ces bya ba 'dis ni mi 'gyur
T03D3808:219a-24: ba'i yongs su grub pas yongs su grub par ston
T03D3808:219a-25: to // rnam par rtog pa med ces bya ba
T03D3808:219a-26: 'dis ni phyin ci ma log par yongs su grub
T03D3808:219a-27: pas yongs su grub par ston to //
T03D3808:219a-28: ci la 'ang thogs pa med pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad la khyab pa ste /
T03D3808:219a-29: gang na yang yod pa ma yin no //
T03D3808:219a-30: de bas na gang gi de bzhin nyid du ma
T03D3808:219a-31: gyur pa yang med de zhes bya ba gsungs te
T03D3808:219a-32: / chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T03D3808:219a-33: nam yang de bzhin nyid du ma gyur pa ma
T03D3808:219a-34: yin zhes bya ba ni dus thams cad du yang
T03D3808:219a-36: gnyis su med ces bya ba ni ngo bo nyid gcig pa'o //
T03D3808:219a-37: de gnyis su byar med ces bya ba ni rnam pa gnyis su dbyer mi nus pa'o //
T03D3808:219a-38: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid tha
T03D3808:219a-39: mi dad pa dbyer med pa gnyis su med pa

T03D3808:219b-0: kyang tha mi dad par dbyer med pa dmigs @219b

T03D3808:219b-5: chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang dmigs su
T03D3808:219b-6: med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis tha mi dad do
T03D3808:219b-7: su med pa'o // // chos thams cad kyi de

T03D3808:219b-9: bzhin nyid kyang dmigs su med pa'i ngo bo nyid
T03D3808:219b-10: kyis tha mi dad do zhes ston te /

T03D3808:219b-12: su med pa'i phyir tha mi dad pa dang gnyis
T03D3808:219b-13: su byar med pa'i phyir dbyer med pa dang /

T03D3808:219b-15: ji ltar chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang
T03D3808:219b-16: tha mi dad dbyer med pa dmigs su med pa'i
T03D3808:219b-17: ngo bo nyid yin pa de bzhin du rab 'byor
T03D3808:219b-18: gyi de bzhin nyid kyang dmigs su med pa'i ngo
T03D3808:219b-19: bo nyid kyis tha mi dad de /

T03D3808:219b-22: de ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las
T03D3808:219b-23: gud na yod pa ma yin te /
T03D3808:219b-24: chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na
T03D3808:219b-25: yod pa ma yin pa de ni nam yang de
T03D3808:219b-26: bzhin nyid ma yin pa ma yin zhing /

T03D3808:219b-28: gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang de lta bu ste /
T03D3808:219b-29: de'i phyir rnam pa gzhan ma yin pas de bzhin
T03D3808:219b-30: gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes kyang gang du yang rjes
T03D3808:219b-31: su skyes pa med do zhes bya bas ni de
T03D3808:219b-32: bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid du chos thams cad
T03D3808:219b-33: kyi de bzhin nyid kyang dmigs su med pa'i ngo
T03D3808:219b-34: bo nyid kyis tha mi dad do //
T03D3808:219b-35: chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid bzhin du gnas
T03D3808:219b-36: brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang dmigs su
T03D3808:219b-37: med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis tha mi dad do
T03D3808:219b-38: zhes ston te / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin
T03D3808:219b-39: nyid gang yin pa de chos thams cad kyi de
T03D3808:219b-40: bzhin nyid las gzhan ma yin la /

T03D3808:219b-42: pa ma yin pa de yang nam yang de bzhin
T03D3808:219b-43: nyid ma yin pa ma yin te /
T03D3808:219b-44: chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid ni dus thams cad du yod pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3808:220a-1: pa'i de bzhin nyid de las gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir /
T03D3808:220a-2: dus thams cad du yod do //
T03D3808:220a-3: de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin
T03D3808:220a-4: nyid kyang chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las
T03D3808:220a-5: gzhan pa ma yin pa'i phyir dus thams cad du

T03D3808:220a-8: skye ba'i mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir gang du yang rjes su skyes pa med pa zhes kyang bya'o //
T03D3808:220a-9: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'das pa ma yin ma 'ongs pa ma yin /
T03D3808:220a-10: da ltar byung ba ma yin zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'dis ston te /
T03D3808:220a-11: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa kun brtags pa'i bdag
T03D3808:220a-12: nyid kyis dus gsum du gtogs kyang de bzhin nyid
T03D3808:220a-13: ni dus kyis bsdus pa ma yin pa de bzhin

T03D3808:220a-15: du dus gsum du gtogs kyang /
T03D3808:220a-16: de dag gis de bzhin nyid ni dus kyis bsdus pa ma yin no //
T03D3808:220a-17: de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang dus kyis bsdus pa ma yin no //
T03D3808:220a-18: de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa zhes bya'o //
T03D3808:220a-19: lha'i bu dag 'di la 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid
T03D3808:220a-20: kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de

T03D3808:220a-25: pas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang
T03D3808:220a-26: mnyam mo // de dag kyang de bzhin nyid de dang bdag bzhin nyid gcig pa'i phyir mnyam mo /

T03D3808:220a-28: de bzhin nyid mnyam pa de nyid kyi phyir 'das

T03D3808:220a-34: kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang mnyam
T03D3808:220a-35: pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
T03D3808:220b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin @220b nyid mnyam pa
T03D3808:220b-1: nyid kyis 'das pa'i chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid
T03D3808:220b-3: de bzhin du gzhan dag la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
T03D3808:220b-4: gzugs kyi chos mnyam pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba
T03D3808:220b-5: la sogs pas chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid
T03D3808:220b-6: de nyid rgya cher ston to //
T03D3808:220b-7: lha'i bu dag de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa'i
T03D3808:220b-8: de bzhin nyid 'di la brten nas de bzhin gshegs
T03D3808:220b-9: pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan thob par 'gyur ro zhes
T03D3808:220b-10: bya ba ni rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa zhes
T03D3808:220b-11: bya ba de ni yang dag pa'i de bzhin nyid
T03D3808:220b-12: kyi tshig bla dags so zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro
T03D3808:220b-13: // rnam pa drug tu g-yos zhes bya ba ni g-yo ba dang /
T03D3808:220b-18: 'khrugs zhes bya ba rnam pa drug ste /
T03D3808:220b-19: de ngag las chung ngu dang 'bring po dang chen
T03D3808:220b-20: po'i dbang gis re re la yang rnam pa gsum
T03D3808:220b-21: du phye na / mtshan ltas chen po rnam pa bco brgyad dang /
T03D3808:220b-22: phyogs drug rnams su mtho ba dang /
T03D3808:220b-23: dma' ba'i dbang gis phyogs su gyur pa rnam pa bcu gnyis te /
T03D3808:220b-24: de dag kyang gleng gzhi'i le'u nyid du bshad zin to //
T03D3808:220b-25: de la g-yos pa la sogs pa 'di dag kyang
T03D3808:220b-26: rgyu rnam pa gnyis kyis 'byung ste lha mthu chen
T03D3808:220b-27: po rnams dam pa'i chos thos nas dga' zhing mgu
T03D3808:220b-28: ba skyes pa'i mthus phan tshun yongs su bzhin gshegs
T03D3808:220b-29: pa thams cad kyang mnyam mo //
T03D3808:220b-30: de dangs pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang chos kyi che
T03D3808:220b-31: ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa'i phyir 'das pa'i de bzhin
T03D3808:220b-32: gshegs pa thams cad kyis bshad pa'i chos nyid kyis
T03D3808:220b-33: dbang du gyur pa nyid du ston pa lta bur
T03D3808:220b-34: gyur pa'o // de la phyogs gcig par rab tu ldeg pa ni g-yo ba'o //
T03D3808:220b-35: shing ljon pa bzhin bdag nyid thams cad 'gul ba ni 'gul ba'o //
T03D3808:220b-36: me mgal skor ba bzhin du 'khor ba ni ldeg pa'o //
T03D3808:220b-37: sgra skad ring du 'byung ba'i sgra ni chem chem mo //
T03D3808:220b-39: sgra ber ber po ni 'ur 'ur ro //
T03D3808:220b-40: yang na sa ni g-yos so //
T03D3808:220b-42: ri thams cad ni ldeg go //
T03D3808:220b-43: lha'i rnga bo che la sogs pa ni chem chem mo //
T03D3808:220b-44: rgya mtsho la sogs pa ni 'khrugs so //
T03D3808:221a-1: de dag kyang dang po rtsom pa'i tshe ni dal zhing mi drag par snang ngo //
T03D3808:221a-2: de'i 'og tu ni de bas drag go //
T03D3808:221a-3: tha mar de bas kyang rab tu drag ste /
T03D3808:221a-4: rnam pa gsum du phyo bas bco brgyad du 'gyur te /
T03D3808:221a-5: phyogs rnams kyang cig car mtho ba la sogs par
T03D3808:221a-6: gyur na mugs shing rnam par zhigs pa bzhin du
T03D3808:221a-7: rab tu 'khrugs par 'gyur ba'i phyir mthar gyis mtho
T03D3808:221a-8: ba dang dma' bar gyur to //

T03D3808:221a-10: shing dang ri la sogs pa rab tu 'khrugs par
T03D3808:221a-11: gyur pa de'i tshe shar phyogs mtho ba 'dra bar

T03D3808:221a-13: snang ba de'i tshe nub phyogs rang bzhin du gnas
T03D3808:221a-14: kyang dma' ba 'dra bar snang ba de'i tshe shar
T03D3808:221a-15: phyogs mtho na nub phyogs dma' zhes bya'o //
T03D3808:221a-16: gang gi tshe nub phyogs kyi sa dang shing dang
T03D3808:221a-17: ri la sogs pa rab tu 'khrugs par gyur pa
T03D3808:221a-18: de'i tshe nub phyogs mtho ba 'dra bar snang zhing
T03D3808:221a-19: shar phyogs rang bzhin du gnas kyang dma' ba 'dra
T03D3808:221a-20: bar snang ngo // de bzhin du thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o //
T03D3808:221a-21: gzugs kyi rjes su ma skyes /
T03D3808:221a-22: gzugs las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so zhes
T03D3808:221a-23: bya ba ni gzugs skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos po
T03D3808:221a-24: med pas gnas brtan yang dngos po med pa'i phyir
T03D3808:221a-25: gzugs kyi rjes su skye ba'am /
T03D3808:221a-26: gzugs las gzhan pa gang du yang skye bar mi rigs so //
T03D3808:221a-27: de bzhin nyid kyang skye ba dang 'brel pa med pas de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su skye ba'am /
T03D3808:221a-28: de bzhin nyid las gzhan pa gang du yang mi rigs so //
T03D3808:221a-29: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid dang ma nor ba
T03D3808:221a-30: de bzhin nyid dang gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin
T03D3808:221a-31: nyid zab po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni
T03D3808:221a-32: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos po ni de bzhin nyid
T03D3808:221a-33: do // ma nor ba'i dngos po ni ma nor ba'i de bzhin nyid do //
T03D3808:221a-34: gzhan ma yin pa'i dngos po ni gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid de /
T03D3808:221a-35: chos rnams kyi brjod du med pa'i mtshan nyid yongs
T03D3808:221a-36: su grub pa don dam pa'i dbyings gang yin pa
T03D3808:221a-37: de ni dus thams cad du de bzhin nyid du
T03D3808:221a-38: 'gyur zhing / nor bar mi 'gyur gzhan du mi
T03D3808:221b-0: 'gyur @221b ba'i phyir de bzhin nyid dang ma nor
T03D3808:221b-1: ba de bzhin nyid dang gzhan ma yin pa de
T03D3808:221b-3: yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid ni rnam pa gsum ste /
T03D3808:221b-4: mi 'jig par yongs su grub pa dang /
T03D3808:221b-5: phyin ci ma log par yongs su grub pa dang /
T03D3808:221b-6: mi 'gyur bar yongs su grub pa'o //
T03D3808:221b-7: de la mi 'jig par yongs su grub pa'i phyir de bzhin nyid do //
T03D3808:221b-8: phyin ci ma log par yongs su grub pa'i phyir ma nor ba de bzhin nyid do //
T03D3808:221b-9: mi 'gyur bar yongs su grub pa'i phyir gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do //
T03D3808:221b-10: chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings dang chos gnas pa

T03D3808:221b-16: chos kyi dngos po ni chos nyid de kun brtags pa dang /
T03D3808:221b-17: rnam par brtags pa'i chos thams cad las gzhan du

T03D3808:221b-19: med pa chos kyi dngos por gnas pa gang yin
T03D3808:221b-20: pa de gnas pa'i phyir chos nyid kyi sgrar brjod
T03D3808:221b-21: do // chos kyi dbyings zhes bya ba ni 'byung gnas kyi mtshan nyid gsungs pa ste /
T03D3808:221b-24: ma 'dres pa la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so //
T03D3808:221b-25: dbyings kyi sgra ni rgyu'i don te sangs rgyas kyi
T03D3808:221b-26: chos rnams kyi 'byung gnas yin pa'i phyir chos kyi
