T03D3808:262b-10: nyes pa med do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T03D3808:262b-11: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
T03D3808:262b-12: bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis
T03D3808:262b-13: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gal te bsam
T03D3808:262b-14: gtan dang / mngon par shes pa dang /
T03D3808:262b-15: sems can rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin na de dag ji ltar bskyed /
T03D3808:262b-16: sems can rnams kyang ji ltar lung bstan zhes gnas brtan gyis zhus pa'o //
T03D3808:262b-17: des na bcom ldan 'das kyis rab 'byor gal te 'dod pa rnams dang /
T03D3808:262b-18: sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pas /
T03D3808:262b-19: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir thams cad grub kyi /
T03D3808:262b-20: gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes bstan te /
T03D3808:262b-22: sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams dngos po med
T03D3808:262b-23: pa'i ngo bo nyid yin te de'i phyir lung bstan
T03D3808:262b-24: to // bsam gtan rnams bskyed do //
T03D3808:262b-28: gzhan gyi dngos po zhes bya ba ni kun brtags pa'i dngos po'i bdag nyid kyis ma yin gyi /
T03D3808:262b-29: ri bong gi rva bzhin du shin tu dngos po med pa'i bdag nyid kyis ni ma yin la /
T03D3808:262b-30: rang gi dngos po'i bdag nyid 'ga' zhig tu yang ma yin gyi /
T03D3808:262b-31: gzhan gyi dngos po'i bdag nyid 'ga' zhig tu ma yin no zhes bstan pa'o //
T03D3808:262b-32: ji ltar mthar gyis spyod pa dang /
T03D3808:263a-0: mthar gyis nan tan du bgyi ba mchis par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni ji @263a * //
T03D3808:263a-1: ltar sgyu ma'i glang po che la sogs par dmigs pa dang /
T03D3808:263a-2: mi dmigs pa dag 'phral kho na la 'gyur ba de bzhin du /
T03D3808:263a-3: byang chub sems dpa' yang 'phral kho na la dmigs
T03D3808:263a-4: su med pa rtogs par 'gyur gyi rim gyis ni
T03D3808:263a-5: ma yin no zhes dgongs pa'o ;
T03D3808:263a-6: / rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpas thog
T03D3808:263a-7: mar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang zhes bya
T03D3808:263a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad bstan te /
T03D3808:263a-10: byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag gi don du mthar gyi spyod pa mi rtsom gyi /
T03D3808:263a-11: sems can thams cad kyi 'phral la shes par mi nus te /
T03D3808:263a-12: rim gyis shes par bya ba'i phyir rim gyis rtsom ste /
T03D3808:263a-13: sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung zhes bya ba la sogs pas /
T03D3808:263a-14: de dag gi rim pa ston to //
T03D3808:263a-15: zhugs nas zhes bya ba ni sems skyed nas so //
T03D3808:263a-16: pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi ngo bo nyid dang /
T03D3808:263a-17: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos thams
T03D3808:263a-18: cad la yod pa'am med pa dmigs su yod snyam
T03D3808:263a-19: mam zhes bya ba ni gal te med par 'dzin
T03D3808:263a-20: par gyur na chad par 'gyur ro //
T03D3808:263a-21: dngos po med pa dang ngo bo nyid du smra
T03D3808:263a-22: ba rnams dngos po med par smra ba dang ngo
T03D3808:263a-23: bo nyid yod par smra bas /
T03D3808:263a-24: yod po'am med pa nyid kyi mthar byar mi rung bas bstan pa'o //
T03D3808:263a-25: rab 'byor mi dmigs pa nyid thob pa'o //
T03D3808:263a-26: mi dmigs pa nyid mngon par rtogs pa'o zhes bya ba ni mi dmigs pa thob pa dang /
T03D3808:263a-27: mi dmigs pa'i mngon par rtogs pa zhes brjod na thob par bya ba dang /
T03D3808:263a-28: mngon par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir mi dmigs pa yod par 'gyur te /
T03D3808:263a-29: de lta na ni dmigs pa nyid thob pa dang /
T03D3808:263a-31: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces brjod par bstan to //
T03D3808:263a-32: rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes
T03D3808:263a-33: pa yang ga la mchis zhes bya ba ni sa
T03D3808:263a-34: brgyad pa yan chad la rnam par smin pa'i mngon
T03D3808:263a-36: rnam par smin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams nye bar gnas so //
T03D3808:263a-37: mthar gyis grub pa bstan pa thams cad ni go sla'o //
T03D3808:263b-0: bcom ldan 'das ji @263b ltar na sems gcig gis
T03D3808:263b-1: pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par
T03D3808:263b-2: 'gyur ba lags zhes bya ba la sogs pa zhus
T03D3808:263b-3: pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas
T03D3808:263b-4: yongs su zin par sbyin pa byin na zhes bya
T03D3808:263b-5: ba brjod pas / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3808:263b-6: phyin pas yongs su zin pa'i phyir sems can thams
T03D3808:263b-7: cad kyang gcig tu 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'o //
T03D3808:263b-8: gzhan ma yin no zhes bya ba ni gcig kho nar ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T03D3808:263b-9: de nas zhus pa gnyis pa la yang /
T03D3808:263b-10: sems gnyis su med pa'i phyir sems gcig go zhes ston to //
T03D3808:263b-11: gnyis kyi 'du shes med par pha rol tu phyin
T03D3808:263b-12: pa drug la sogs pa chos thams cad sgom pa
T03D3808:263b-13: ni go sla'o // mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems
T03D3808:263b-14: zag pa med pas sbyin pa byin na rnam par
T03D3808:263b-15: smin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs
T03D3808:263b-16: par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni sa brgyad pa yan
T03D3808:263b-17: chad nyon mongs pa 'byung ba med pa dang /
T03D3808:263b-18: rnam par smin pa yin pa'i phyir de skad ces bstan to //
T03D3808:263b-19: sbyin pa des ci zhig bya ba zhes bya ba ni bdud kyi ris rnams smra ba'o //
T03D3808:263b-20: de'i 'og tu pha rol tu phyin pa drug rnam
T03D3808:263b-21: par smin pa'i mngon par shes pa dang bcas pa
T03D3808:263b-22: rnams yongs su rdzogs pa ni gzhung nyid las gzung
T03D3808:263b-23: bar bya'o // chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid shes
T03D3808:263b-24: pa bstan pas rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i
T03D3808:263b-25: pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa yang go sla
T03D3808:263b-26: bar bya'o // ba nyid do // de'i 'og tu
T03D3808:263b-27: bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu
T03D3808:263b-28: dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rang
T03D3808:263b-29: gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa rnams la zhes bya
T03D3808:263b-30: ba la sogs pa zhus pa dang /
T03D3808:263b-31: lan dang ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba bstan pa dang /
T03D3808:263b-32: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi
T03D3808:263b-33: sbyin pa dag kyang gzhung nyid las gzung bar bya'o
T03D3808:263b-34: // de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi
T03D3808:263b-35: sbyin pa bstan pa'i lhag ma ni sngar bstan zin
T03D3808:263b-36: // te / sngar ma bstan pa dag bstan to //
T03D3808:263b-37: de la nyon mongs pa med pa gang zhe na
T03D3808:263b-38: zhes bya ba ni bdag gi phyir gzhan dag la
T03D3808:263b-39: nyon mongs pa skye bar ma gyur cig ces byin
T03D3808:264a-0: gyis brlabs nas ting nge 'dzin la @264a * //
T03D3808:264a-2: sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs kyis gzhan gyi rgyud
T03D3808:264a-3: la nyon mongs pa skye ba'i skabs mi 'byed pa
T03D3808:264a-4: de ni nyon mongs pa med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
T03D3808:264a-5: pa zhes bya'o // de la smon lam gyi shes
T03D3808:264a-6: pa gang zhe na zhes bya ba ni dus gsum
T03D3808:264a-7: dang khams gsum gyi chos rnams las shes par bya
T03D3808:264a-9: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das par gtogs pa
T03D3808:264a-10: gang yang rung ba 'ga' zhig shes par bya ba'i
T03D3808:264a-11: phyir smon lam btab pas na de de ma thag
T03D3808:264a-12: tu shes pa gang gi shes par gyur pa de
T03D3808:264a-13: smon lam sngon du 'gro ba'i shes pa yin pas
T03D3808:264a-14: smon nas shes pa zhes bya'o //
T03D3808:264a-15: de la yongs su dag pa bzhi gang zhe na zhes bya ba la /
T03D3808:264a-16: sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i gnas ngan
T03D3808:264a-17: len thams cad gnas dang shin tu bral bar gyur
T03D3808:264a-18: pa dang / bdag gi lus kyang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin len pa dang /
T03D3808:264a-19: gnas pa dang 'chi 'pho ba rnams la rang dbang du gyur pa ni gnas yongs su dag pa'o //
T03D3808:264a-21: yongs su bsgyur ba'i grangs su gtogs pa dang /
T03D3808:264a-22: dmigs pa thams cad la dbang du gyur pa ni dmigs pa yongs su dag pa'o //
T03D3808:264a-23: sems kyi gnas ngan len thams cad dang bral bas
T03D3808:264a-24: sems la rnam pa thams cad du dge ba 'phel
T03D3808:264a-25: ba ni sems yongs su dag pa'o //
T03D3808:264a-26: ma rig pa'i phyogs kyi gnas ngan len thams cad
T03D3808:264a-27: dang bral bas shes par bya ba thams cad la
T03D3808:264a-28: shes pa sgrib pa med pa dbang du gyur pa
T03D3808:264a-29: ni ye shes yongs su dag pa'o //
T03D3808:264a-30: de la dbang bcu gang zhe na zhes bya ba
T03D3808:264a-31: la ji srid 'dod pa de srid du 'dug pa
T03D3808:264a-33: bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang /
T03D3808:264a-34: rnam par thar pa la sogs pa sems gnas pa
T03D3808:264a-35: gang gis gnas par 'dod pa des ji ltar 'dod
T03D3808:264a-36: pa bzhin gnas pa 'di ni sems la dbang ba'o
T03D3808:264a-37: // kun du brtags pa tsam gyis de ma thag tu /
T03D3808:264a-38: de'i bza' ba la sogs pa yo byad thams cad
T03D3808:264a-39: ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin 'byor pa 'di ni yo
T03D3808:264a-41: skye bar 'gyur ba'i las thams cad la ji ltar
T03D3808:264b-0: @264b 'dod pa bzhin du bsgyur ba 'di ni las
T03D3808:264b-1: la dbang ba'o // skye ba'i gnas thams cad du /
T03D3808:264b-2: gang du 'dod par ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du skye ba 'di ni skye ba la dbang ba'o //
T03D3808:264b-3: dngos po gang dang gang ji ltar mos par byas
T03D3808:264b-4: pa de dag de bzhin du 'grub pa 'di ni
T03D3808:264b-6: de'i smon lam thams cad ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin
T03D3808:264b-7: du 'grub pa 'di ni smon lam la dbang ba'o
T03D3808:264b-8: // rdzu 'phrul gyi dgos pa thams cad ji ltar
T03D3808:264b-9: 'dod pa bzhin du 'grub pa 'di ni rdzu 'phrul
T03D3808:264b-10: // la dbang ba'o // gang yang shes par bya
T03D3808:264b-11: ba'i dngos por rab tu zab pa shes par 'dod
T03D3808:264b-12: pa de dag myur ba nyid du shes pa 'di
T03D3808:264b-13: ni ye shes la dbang ba'o //
T03D3808:264b-16: yi ge'i tshogs rnams ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin thob pa dang /
T03D3808:264b-17: chos thams cad yang dag par rnam par dgod pa la mkhas pa 'di ni chos la dbang ba'o //
T03D3808:264b-18: de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsrung ba med pa
T03D3808:264b-19: gsum gang zhe na zhes bya ba la srung ba
T03D3808:264b-20: med pa gsum ni gzhung nyid las go sla'o //
T03D3808:264b-22: khong khro ba med pas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum ni go sla'o //
T03D3808:264b-23: bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid ces bya ba
T03D3808:264b-24: ni gang dang gang gi tshe ji ltar sems can
T03D3808:264b-25: gyi don mdzad pa de'i tshe /
T03D3808:264b-26: de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin du sgrub pa ni bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid do //
T03D3808:264b-27: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis zhes
T03D3808:264b-28: bya ba ni gzugs tshad mar 'dzin pa'i gang zag
T03D3808:264b-29: rnams dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir rnam par dgod do
T03D3808:264b-30: // de la rigs dang bsam pa dang /
T03D3808:264b-37: thabs la sogs pa che bas skyes bu'i byed pa
T03D3808:264b-38: che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams
T03D3808:264b-39: dang / sangs rgyas rnams la skyes bu chen po zhes bya ste /
T03D3808:264b-40: de dag skyes bu chen po yin pas 'di dag
T03D3808:264b-41: gis brjod cing mngon par bsal bar byed pa'i phyir
T03D3808:264b-42: skyes bu'i chen po'i mtshan rnams so //
T03D3808:265a-2: nying lag rnams la skyes bu chen por mngon par
T03D3808:265a-3: byed pa gang la yang bye brag me pa'i phyir
T03D3808:265a-4: / 'di snyed cig go zhes bya bar mi rung
T03D3808:265a-5: bas sum cu rtsa gnyis zhes bya ba'i grangs don
T03D3808:265a-7: de yang bden mod kyi 'on kyang thos pa dang /
T03D3808:265a-8: dran pa dag las de'i rjes su 'brang ba'i don de lta bu'i grangs nges par bstan te /
T03D3808:265a-9: 'dir yang grangs 'di nyid kyis bstan to //
T03D3808:265a-10: mtshan 'di rnams kyang mdor bstan pa dang /
T03D3808:265a-15: dang po ni mdor bstan pa'o //
T03D3808:265a-16: de'i 'og tu mtshan de rnams 'grel pa ni bshad pa'o //
T03D3808:265a-17: sngon gyi las smos pa ni rgyu'o //
T03D3808:265a-18: snga ltas smos pa ni 'bras bu'o //
T03D3808:265a-19: phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa zhes
T03D3808:265a-20: bya ba la 'khor lo ni 'jig rten na rnam
T03D3808:265a-21: pa gnyis te / mtshon cha'i 'khor lo dang /
T03D3808:265a-22: 'gro ba 'jug pa'i 'khor lo shing rta la sogs pa'i 'phang lo lta bu'o //
T03D3808:265a-23: de yang phyag dang zhabs gnyis ka la 'byung ngo //
T03D3808:265a-24: 'di'i sngon gyi las kyang rnam pa gnyis te /
T03D3808:265a-25: bla ma la skyel zhing bsu ba'i grangs su gtogs
T03D3808:265a-26: pa tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas bsdus
T03D3808:265a-28: de'i 'bras bus 'gro bar 'jug pa'i 'khor lo zhabs kyi mthil du 'byung ngo //
T03D3808:265a-32: mchod rten gyi gan du 'gro ba dang /
T03D3808:265a-33: g-yog byin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas
T03D3808:265a-34: bsdus pa de'i 'bras bus phyag gi mthil gnyis su
T03D3808:265a-35: 'byung ngo // 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan ba sogs pa lta bu'o //
T03D3808:265a-36: gang gi tshe de dag thams cad rnam pa thams
T03D3808:265a-37: gsum yongs su ma rdzogs pa de'i tshe ni mtshan
T03D3808:265a-38: de dag gis 'khor los sgyur bar gyur nas rab
T03D3808:265a-40: de'i tshe ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ste /
T03D3808:265a-41: dper na rgyal po shang ka zhes bya la sogs pa lta bu'o //
T03D3808:265a-42: gang gi tshe de dag thams cad rnam pa thams
T03D3808:265a-43: cad du yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de'i tshe
T03D3808:265b-0: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya @265b ste /
T03D3808:265b-1: de bas na rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa de na zhes gsungs so //
T03D3808:265b-2: de la med do sde gzhan dag las mtshan gzhan dang gzhan dpal be'u dang /
T03D3808:265b-5: bum pa gang ba dang nya sbrel ba dang rgyal mtshan dang /
T03D3808:265b-9: rnga yab la sogs pa dag kyang ma bstan tam zhe na /
T03D3808:265b-10: de yang bden mod kyi gtso bor gyur pa 'khor
T03D3808:265b-11: lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa bstan na de dag kyang
T03D3808:265b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs gnyis la mi snang ba'i
T03D3808:265b-14: mtshan bzang po thams cad med pa yang ma yin
T03D3808:265b-15: gyi / mtshan gyis 'khor lo de dag nyid bsdu ba'i phyir /
T03D3808:265b-16: rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'o zhes bya bar bstan to zhes kha cig smra'o //
T03D3808:265b-17: de ni g-yog 'khor shin tu mang ba'i snga ltas
T03D3808:265b-18: so zhes bya ba ni 'khor los sgyur ba dang
T03D3808:265b-19: / sangs rgyas rnams thun mong ste /
T03D3808:265b-20: 'khor lo ni mu khyud nas bzung ste rtsibs dang
T03D3808:265b-21: ldan pa'i dbang gis g-yog 'khor shin tu mang ba
T03D3808:265b-22: dang mthun no // zhabs shin tu gnas pa zhes
T03D3808:265b-23: bya ba ni 'di ltar gzhan dag ni sa mi
T03D3808:265b-24: dang mthun no // mnyam pa'am / rkang pa'i mthil mi mnyam pa dang /
T03D3808:265b-25: 'dod chags la sogs pa spyod pa'i dbang ngam /
T03D3808:265b-29: mchong zhing 'gro la dbus su yang skabs 'byung bar 'gyur gyi /
T03D3808:265b-30: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ni de lta ma yin te /
T03D3808:265b-31: zhabs kyi mthil thams cad mnyam par sa la 'bab
T03D3808:265b-32: par gshegs pa dang mnyam par sa la reg pa
T03D3808:265b-33: la zhabs shin tu gnas pa zhes bya ste /
T03D3808:265b-34: sa chen po thams cad kyang mthon dman dang /
T03D3808:265b-40: khung la sogs pa med par mnyam pas gnas shing /
T03D3808:265b-41: 'jig rten gyi khams brgya stong du ma'i dbang gis /
T03D3808:265b-42: thag ring ba dag kyang nye bar 'gyur ro //
T03D3808:265b-43: sngon gyi las bstan pa la /
T03D3808:265b-44: yi dam la brtan pas zhes bya ba ni bden pa dang /
T03D3808:265b-47: shes rab kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi dbang gis /
T03D3808:266a-1: pa thams cad la sus kyang mi 'phrogs pa'i phyir de skad ces bya'o //
T03D3808:266a-2: de ni mi g-yo ba'i snga ltas so zhes bya ba ni bdud dang /
T03D3808:266a-4: mu stegs can la sogs pa thams cad kyis mi g-yos pa'o //
T03D3808:266a-5: phyag dang zhabs dra bas 'brel ba zhes bya ba
T03D3808:266a-6: ni phyag gi sor mo'i tshigs dang po nas phyag
T03D3808:266a-7: sor gyi bar phra seng seng po med pa /
T03D3808:266a-8: sor gdub la sogs pa'i rgyan kyang gzhug tu rung ba ste /
T03D3808:266a-9: rnam pa thams cad du mdzes pa'i dra bas 'brel ba'o //
T03D3808:266a-11: bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po dag kun du bsten
T03D3808:266a-12: pas zhes bya ba ni sbyin pas bsdu ba la
T03D3808:266a-13: sogs pa'i dbang gis ni phyag gnyis dra ba can
T03D3808:266a-14: du gyur to // de las gzhan pa don spyod
T03D3808:266a-15: pa la sogs pa'i dbang gis ni zhabs gnyis dra
T03D3808:266a-16: ba can du gyur to zhes 'chad do //
T03D3808:266a-17: yang na phyag gnyis kyis ni sdud par 'gyur ro //
T03D3808:266a-18: bsdus pa'i sems can rnams kyis zhabs gtugs pa las gyur to //
T03D3808:266a-19: sor mo'i rnam pa seng seng po med pa zhes bya bar gzung ngo //
T03D3808:266a-20: legs par sdud cing 'jam par gyur pa'i phyir 'di dag bsdu ba'i dngos po dang mthun no //
T03D3808:266a-21: myur du 'du ba zhes bya ba ni 'khor brgyad
T03D3808:266a-22: chos bshad pa la myur du 'du'o zhes bya ba'i
T03D3808:266a-23: tha tshig go // kha cig ni phyag dang /
T03D3808:266a-24: zhabs dra bas 'brel ba la gzhan du 'chad de /
